original: 218 / bdud rnams dag gis khrag ni btung ba'i slad du 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi tshe yang bkod pa ste //
analyzed: 218 / bdud rnams dag gis khrag ni btung ba'i slad du 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi tshe yang bkod pa ste //
translated: ‚ÄúThe demons, in order to drink his blood, have arranged all this in former times.

original: 'jug ngogs bsnyung gnas dag gis shi bar gyur dang g-yul du bsnun pa nyid dang ba lang nyi ma ni //
analyzed: 'jug ngogs bsnyung gnas dag gis shi bar gyur dang g-yul du bsnun pa nyid dang ba lang nyi ma ni //
translated: He died of fasting and of wounds in battle, and of the sun and the bull,

original: grol ba'i don dang khyim dang nor gyi yul dang bram ze'i bya ba dag la shi ba mtho ris so //
analyzed: grol ba'i don dang khyim dang nor gyi yul dang bram ze'i bya ba dag la shi ba mtho ris so //
translated: For the sake of liberation, of the house, of the country of wealth, and of the rites of the Brahmans.

original: de yi phyir na rang dang gzhan gyi lus ni bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin /
analyzed: de yi phyir na rang dang gzhan gyi lus ni bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin /
translated: Therefore, one should protect this body, which is the abode of the equal happiness of oneself and others.

original: 219 / gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal po las ni rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa thos shing dbang ni blangs nas kyang //
analyzed: 219 / gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal po las ni rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa thos shing dbang ni blangs nas kyang //
translated: ‚ÄúHe who, having heard the conduct of the Supreme Victor in the King of Tantras and having received initiation,

original: slar yang phrag dog byed na de ni dmyal ba brgyad pa ji srid nyid du rab tu 'jug 'gyur te //
analyzed: slar yang phrag dog byed na de ni dmyal ba brgyad pa ji srid nyid du rab tu 'jug 'gyur te //
translated: Again acts with envy, will enter the eight hells for a long time.

original: gang la khab rtse'i sa la mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis dmyal ba rnams ni kun du rgyu bar byed ;
analyzed: gang la khab rtse'i sa la mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis dmyal ba rnams ni kun du rgyu bar byed ;
translated: On the point of a needle, by the power of the result of non-virtue, the hells move about.

original: / de phyir mi rnams sems la phrag dog yod kyi bar du dbang ni blang bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro /
analyzed: / de phyir mi rnams sems la phrag dog yod kyi bar du dbang ni blang bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro /
translated: Therefore, until the minds of men are free from envy, they will not take up the sovereignty.üîΩThe family that produces the Victorious Ones is perfected in generosity, morality, patience, and effort;

original: 220 / rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la sbyin pa tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzod pa brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang // bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang stobs dang ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi //
analyzed: 220 / rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la sbyin pa tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzod pa brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang // bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang stobs dang ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi //
translated: in concentration, wisdom, means, aspiration, power, and knowledge.

original: sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yi skye ba 'di la ste //
analyzed: sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yi skye ba 'di la ste //
translated: By this generosity, the one with a joyful mind will quickly attain the stage of yoga in this life.

original: gang zhig rmongs pa'i mi de rnams kyis de la rjes su 'ching ba byas nas dmyal bar nye bar 'gro /
analyzed: gang zhig rmongs pa'i mi de rnams kyis de la rjes su 'ching ba byas nas dmyal bar nye bar 'gro /
translated: But those deluded people who bind themselves to it go to hell.üîΩFor the sake of land and wealth, with a very fickle heart, the father takes up a sharp sword

original: 221 / sa dang dpal 'byor slad du shin tu g-yo ba'i snying ldan sngar ma yis ni ral gri rnon po dag / bzung ste kun nas 'thab mo pa yis dkrigs pa'i yan lag bzhi ldan g-yul du rab tu zhugs pa na //
analyzed: 221 / sa dang dpal 'byor slad du shin tu g-yo ba'i snying ldan sngar ma yis ni ral gri rnon po dag / bzung ste kun nas 'thab mo pa yis dkrigs pa'i yan lag bzhi ldan g-yul du rab tu zhugs pa na //
translated: and enters the battle with the four divisions of the army arrayed.

original: glang chen tshogs pa mthong nas 'jigs pa de yi lag pa'i mthil nas ral gri dag ni lhung gyur pa //
analyzed: glang chen tshogs pa mthong nas 'jigs pa de yi lag pa'i mthil nas ral gri dag ni lhung gyur pa //
translated: The sword falls from the hand of the man who, seeing a herd of elephants, is seized with fear.

original: de la ral gri'i skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin ji lta de bzhin nyid du sngags kyi rigs kyi'o /
analyzed: de la ral gri'i skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin ji lta de bzhin nyid du sngags kyi rigs kyi'o /
translated: The fault is not of the sword, but of the man; in the same way, the fault is not of the mantra, but of the man.

original: 222 / sngags dang dpa' bo'i rim pa yis kyang lha min gdengs can lha rnams drag po'i sa la bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: 222 / sngags dang dpa' bo'i rim pa yis kyang lha min gdengs can lha rnams drag po'i sa la bsgrub par bya //
translated: By the process of the mantra and the hero, the Asuras, the Nagas, and the gods are established in the state of Rudra.

original: rang byin brlab pas lha mo dam tshig rigs la gnas rnams bsam gtan bzlas pa sbyin sreg dag gis kyang //
analyzed: rang byin brlab pas lha mo dam tshig rigs la gnas rnams bsam gtan bzlas pa sbyin sreg dag gis kyang //
translated: By the process of the self-consecration, the goddesses, abiding in the clan of the pledge, are established in the state of the hero by the meditation, the recitation, and the burnt offerings.

original: dag pa'i rim pas @79b dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun chad med par dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis so //
analyzed: dag pa'i rim pas @79b dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun chad med par dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis so //
translated: By the process of the purification, the consecration, the mantrin, with a mind of great joy, should perform the rite without interruption.

original: ye shes yid bzhin nor bur gang zhig rab tu gyur pa de las kyang ni rgyal ba'i lam 'di'o /
analyzed: ye shes yid bzhin nor bur gang zhig rab tu gyur pa de las kyang ni rgyal ba'i lam 'di'o /
translated: The path of the Victor is the transformation of the mind into the wish-fulfilling jewel of knowledge.

original: 223 / me ni dngul chu'i dgra nyid yin te ma dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu 'ching ba med //
analyzed: 223 / me ni dngul chu'i dgra nyid yin te ma dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu 'ching ba med //
translated: The fire is the enemy of the quicksilver; but if the mother is removed, the quicksilver is never bound.

original: ma bcings na ni gser byed med de gser dang bral na smra po rnams la longs spyod med pa nyid //
analyzed: ma bcings na ni gser byed med de gser dang bral na smra po rnams la longs spyod med pa nyid //
translated: If it is not bound, there is no gold; and if there is no gold, there is no enjoyment for the speakers.

original: de bzhin bud med sbyor ba bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag gi sems ni 'ching mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin bud med sbyor ba bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag gi sems ni 'ching mi 'gyur //
translated: In the same way, if one is without the union with the woman, the mind of speech of the yogis is not bound.

original: bcings pa med na lus 'bigs med de ma phug lus kyis 'dir ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min /
analyzed: bcings pa med na lus 'bigs med de ma phug lus kyis 'dir ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min /
translated: If it is not bound, there is no piercing of the body; and if there is no piercing, the body does not bestow the innate bliss here.

original: 224 / skyed mos tshal lam re bo dag ni skye bo ri dags bral bar zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: 224 / skyed mos tshal lam re bo dag ni skye bo ri dags bral bar zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya //
translated: In a garden or a lonely place, free of people and animals, one should accomplish the peaceful mantras.

original: drag po rnams ni drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gnas su rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang //
analyzed: drag po rnams ni drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gnas su rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang //
translated: The wrathful ones should be accomplished in a charnel ground, a place of the supreme deity, and also in a place of paralysis and confusion.

original: dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas mchog gi sa la bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor ba la //
analyzed: dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas mchog gi sa la bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor ba la //
translated: The magician should practice subjugation and attraction on the supreme ground, in union with all the consorts of bliss.

original: gnas gzhan dang ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gnas gzhan dang ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur /
translated: In another place, in another womb, birth will not be accomplished even in a hundred thousand lifetimes of men.

original: 225 / khyim dang grong du bgrang phreng dag gis nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas ni //
analyzed: 225 / khyim dang grong du bgrang phreng dag gis nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas ni //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the house or in the village, by the recitation of the rosary, day and night, of the formula,

original: ngal zhing rmongs te chags pa dang bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa rjod par byed //
analyzed: ngal zhing rmongs te chags pa dang bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa rjod par byed //
translated: weary and confused, detached from desire, he proclaims that there is no more success in the formula.

original: gnas dang stong pa dus dang mchog gi mtshan mo la gnas yang dag par ni shes pa min pa nyid //
analyzed: gnas dang stong pa dus dang mchog gi mtshan mo la gnas yang dag par ni shes pa min pa nyid //
translated: ‚ÄúHe does not know the place, the void, the time, the supreme night;

original: rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyi nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin /
analyzed: rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyi nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin /
translated: he anoints the head with medicines for the disease of the toes.

original: 226 / bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen po rnams dang gdan rnams dang // sbyin sreg sngags kyi rab gnas rdul tshon la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drangs bskul ba med par yang //
analyzed: 226 / bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen po rnams dang gdan rnams dang // sbyin sreg sngags kyi rab gnas rdul tshon la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drangs bskul ba med par yang //
translated: ‚ÄúThe meditation, the recitation of the formula, the great mandalas, the seats, the burnt offerings, the consecration of the formula, the sand, the invocation of the families of the Victor, without urging,

original: bud med sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag bde ba phyag rgya'i dngos grub ster bar byed //
analyzed: bud med sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag bde ba phyag rgya'i dngos grub ster bar byed //
translated: Having abandoned the union with a woman, the supreme, all-pervading Lord bestows the attainment of the seal of bliss.

original: de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor ba yis thar pa'i slad du bsgom par bya /
analyzed: de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor ba yis thar pa'i slad du bsgom par bya /
translated: Therefore, the yogi/nƒ´ should meditate on it for the sake of liberation at the proper time each day.

original: 227 / rang gi sems ni brgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mi yi bdag po rang bzhin med par 'gyur //üîΩsad la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed de de dag srog chags rnams @80a * //
analyzed: 227 / rang gi sems ni brgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mi yi bdag po rang bzhin med par 'gyur // sad la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed de de dag srog chags rnams @80a * //
translated: One‚Äôs mind, O King, when it has entered deep sleep or deep sleeplessness, is devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin //
analyzed: kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin //
translated: When it awakens, it is clear that it has intrinsic nature, but that is not the path to liberation for living beings.

original: dngos dang dngos med kyis phye sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la bde mnyam ster ba min //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med kyis phye sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la bde mnyam ster ba min //
translated: The mind, divided into the existent and the nonexistent, does not bestow the bliss of reality to the yogi/nis.

original: gang zhig mkha' yi shes rab la 'khyud lhan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang sems de ni thar pa ster /
analyzed: gang zhig mkha' yi shes rab la 'khyud lhan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang sems de ni thar pa ster /
translated: The mind that abides in the innate bliss, embraced by the wisdom of space, bestows liberation.

original: 228 / aom a'a: h'um ho rim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni rtag tu chang ni sbyangs nas rtogs par bya //
analyzed: 228 / aom a'a: h'um ho rim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni rtag tu chang ni sbyangs nas rtogs par bya //
translated: O·πÉ ƒÅ·∏• h≈´·πÉ ho·∏•. Having first purified the wine with the sequence of the syllables, one should understand it.

original: rab tu 'bar bar byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas bsgom par byas nas ni //
analyzed: rab tu 'bar bar byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas bsgom par byas nas ni //
translated: Having made it very hot, he should meditate in stages, as if the moon were melting.

original: snod de nas ni thig le dag gis lag pad ri bong can gyi ming med rtse mos sa dag la //
analyzed: snod de nas ni thig le dag gis lag pad ri bong can gyi ming med rtse mos sa dag la //
translated: From that vessel, with the drops, with the tip of the thumb and ring finger, the moon,

original: phyi rol tu ni zur gsum byas nas de yi dbus su nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum po'o /
analyzed: phyi rol tu ni zur gsum byas nas de yi dbus su nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum po'o /
translated: outside, having made a triangle, in the middle of that, a circle, like the sun.

original: 229 / de yi dbus su 'di yi ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum gnas pa dag kyang sngags pas bsgoms byas nas //
analyzed: 229 / de yi dbus su 'di yi ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum gnas pa dag kyang sngags pas bsgoms byas nas //
translated: In the middle of that, the yogin should meditate on the gnosis wheel, the abode of the three worlds.

original: mthe bo dang ni ming med dag gis nyin zhag so so'i dus su tshim par byed pa la sogs bya //
analyzed: mthe bo dang ni ming med dag gis nyin zhag so so'i dus su tshim par byed pa la sogs bya //
translated: With the thumb and ring finger, at the time of each day, he should satisfy the lords of the land and the towns, and so forth.

original: yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thog mar 'dir ni gtor ma dang po dbus mtha'i ming gis te //
analyzed: yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thog mar 'dir ni gtor ma dang po dbus mtha'i ming gis te //
translated: First, here, the middle oblation is named after the end of the middle.

original: 'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis dang slar yang sngags pas khro bo'i rgyal po la ni gtor ma'o /
analyzed: 'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis dang slar yang sngags pas khro bo'i rgyal po la ni gtor ma'o /
translated: To HƒÅrƒ´tƒ´, two lumps, and again, the oblation to the King of Wrathful Ones.

original: 230 / pho nya mo rnams dag la zas kyi phung ni sa steng rnams su bdag po rdo rje rnams kyis sbyin //
analyzed: 230 / pho nya mo rnams dag la zas kyi phung ni sa steng rnams su bdag po rdo rje rnams kyis sbyin //
translated: The Vajra Lords give the food-heap to the messengers on the earth.

original: 'byung po rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma slar yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad 'di bklag go //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma slar yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad 'di bklag go //
translated: And the remainder of the food eaten by the spirits is to be read in the verse for the sake of virtue.

original: mgo dang mgrin pa snying ga lte gsang gtsug tor du ni rang gi rdo rje rnams kyis yan lag dgod //
analyzed: mgo dang mgrin pa snying ga lte gsang gtsug tor du ni rang gi rdo rje rnams kyis yan lag dgod //
translated: The limbs are placed by one‚Äôs own vajras in the head, throat, heart, navel, and crown.

original: gnyi ga'i rigs la gnas pa'i yan lag sgo rnams kyis ni gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrigs pa la /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i rigs la gnas pa'i yan lag sgo rnams kyis ni gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrigs pa la /
translated: The limbs of the two families are in the doors of the limbs, at the time of sleep, worship, and intercourse.

original: 231 / lha yi dmigs pa gang yin mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: 231 / lha yi dmigs pa gang yin mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ste //
translated: The object of meditation on the deity is twofold: direct perception and inference.

original: mngon sum dag ni de nyid sbyor bas mkha' la skar ma bzhin du du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
analyzed: mngon sum dag ni de nyid sbyor bas mkha' la skar ma bzhin du du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
translated: Direct perception is the manifold sa·πÉbhogakƒÅya in the sky like stars by the yoga of reality.

original: mngon sum min na rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin de nyid min pa yis ni brtags pa gang //
analyzed: mngon sum min na rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin de nyid min pa yis ni brtags pa gang //
translated: If it is not direct perception, it is an inference, like a dead body, which is imagined by what is not reality.

original: de ni ri mo sogs la blta bya yongs su ma smin blo can rnal 'byor rnams kyi bsgom pa'i don /
analyzed: de ni ri mo sogs la blta bya yongs su ma smin blo can rnal 'byor rnams kyi bsgom pa'i don /
translated: That is the object of meditation for yogis whose minds are not fully ripened with respect to the view, and so forth.

original: 232 / gzugs sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang por bris sku la ni de nyid min pas bsgom par bya //
analyzed: 232 / gzugs sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang por bris sku la ni de nyid min pas bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on the form or the ma·πá·∏çala, which is not real, in the beginning, in the painting.

original: nam mkha' la ni de nyid sbyor ba dag gis rang sems mtshang med pa mtha' dag mthong gyur @80b ba ;
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni de nyid sbyor ba dag gis rang sems mtshang med pa mtha' dag mthong gyur @80b ba ;
translated: Seeing one‚Äôs mind, which is free from error, in its entirety, by means of the union with reality in the sky,

original: / lo yi phyed dang lo gcig bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis ji srid nyid du brtan par 'gyur gyi bar //
analyzed: / lo yi phyed dang lo gcig bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis ji srid nyid du brtan par 'gyur gyi bar //
translated: one should remain for half a year or a year, as determined by the guru, until one is stable.

original: de nas phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur /
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur /
translated: Then, in a few days, by means of the practice of the consort, one will become completely immutable.

original: 233 / rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la gsungs //
analyzed: 233 / rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la gsungs //
translated: This vajra statement is definitely taught in all the kings of tantras for the yogis.

original: byis pa rnams ni smin par byed pa'i don du mchog gi snying rje dag gis sna tshogs gtso bos sbas //
analyzed: byis pa rnams ni smin par byed pa'i don du mchog gi snying rje dag gis sna tshogs gtso bos sbas //
translated: The chief one, with supreme compassion, conceals the variety for the sake of ripening the childish.

original: de phyir de ni dbye ba byas nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
analyzed: de phyir de ni dbye ba byas nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
translated: Therefore, having divided it, the yogƒ´ should meditate on it at each time of the day.

original: phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o /
translated: For the sake of the spiritual power of the consort, there is the invincible creator of the supreme Victor, KƒÅlacakra.

original: 234 / dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las /
analyzed: 234 / dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las /
translated: From the glorious Great Original Buddha, the glorious KƒÅlacakra was extracted.

original: sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
translated: This is the fourth chapter from the glorious KƒÅlacakra Tantra, the Means of Achieving the Gurus.

original: // / gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa gang zhig khyod kyis gsungs pa dag ni cung zad shes //
analyzed: // / gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa gang zhig khyod kyis gsungs pa dag ni cung zad shes //
translated: The means of achieving the principal deity together with the supreme Victor, which you have taught, I know a little.

original: slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal lo lha mi'i bla ma khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs drug a'a li k'a li dag la gnas pa nyid //
analyzed: slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal lo lha mi'i bla ma khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs drug a'a li k'a li dag la gnas pa nyid //
translated: Again, I wish to hear, O guru of gods and humans, the ma·πá·∏çala of the divisions of the elements, and the families of the buddhas and yoginƒ´s abiding in the vowels and consonants.

original: zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos khams kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor la sogs gsungs /
analyzed: zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos khams kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor la sogs gsungs /
translated: Having heard the words of Sucandra, the Lord of Victors taught the mandala, etc. by the division of the elements.

original: 1 / ka ba rnams dang rdo rje phreng ba sa yi dkyil 'khor rtsig pa nyid ni rus pa rnams kyis mdzod //
analyzed: 1 / ka ba rnams dang rdo rje phreng ba sa yi dkyil 'khor rtsig pa nyid ni rus pa rnams kyis mdzod //
translated: The pillars and vajra garland are the earth mandala, and the walls are the bones.

original: sha khrag chu dang bshang ba rnams kyis lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin gzhan du rdul tshon gdab pa ste //
analyzed: sha khrag chu dang bshang ba rnams kyis lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin gzhan du rdul tshon gdab pa ste //
translated: The gods, Yama, and Kubera are the blood, flesh, water, and feces.

original: mkhris pa bad kan gyis ni nyi ma ri bong can yang de bzhin chu rgyus rnams kyis chu skyes rnams //
analyzed: mkhris pa bad kan gyis ni nyi ma ri bong can yang de bzhin chu rgyus rnams kyis chu skyes rnams //
translated: The sun and moon are bile and phlegm, and the lotuses are the veins.

original: ra ba lnga yi re kh'a sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes rnams kyis so /
analyzed: ra ba lnga yi re kh'a sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes rnams kyis so /
translated: The lines of the five ramparts are earth, water, fire, wind, and space.

original: 2 / dus kyi rtsa yis gtso bo'i chu skyes g-yo ba me yi dkyil 'khor la sogs pags pa la sogs kyis //
analyzed: 2 / dus kyi rtsa yis gtso bo'i chu skyes g-yo ba me yi dkyil 'khor la sogs pags pa la sogs kyis //
translated: The principal lotus moves by the time channel, and the fire mandala, etc. are the skin, etc.

original: nyi ma'i sgo rnams bug pa rnams kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin bkod pa so yi phreng bas de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: nyi ma'i sgo rnams bug pa rnams kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin bkod pa so yi phreng bas de bzhin nyid //
translated: The sun doors are the orifices, and the jewel nature is the row of teeth.

original: dur khrod brgyad du 'khor lo g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams ni sor mo rnams kyi sen mo yis //
analyzed: dur khrod brgyad du 'khor lo g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams ni sor mo rnams kyi sen mo yis //
translated: The ma·πá·∏çalas that abide in the moving ma·πá·∏çala of the eight charnel grounds are the fingernails of the fingers.

original: ba spu rnams kyis rdo rje me lce dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtha' ru phyogs dang phyogs bral dag la gnas /üîΩ3 / de ltar nges par sku yi rdo @81a * //
analyzed: ba spu rnams kyis rdo rje me lce dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtha' ru phyogs dang phyogs bral dag la gnas / 3 / de ltar nges par sku yi rdo @81a * //
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala of the vajra flames of the pores of the body abide in the directions and intermediate directions.

original: rje mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dkyil 'khor gyi ni rnam par gsungs //
analyzed: rje mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dkyil 'khor gyi ni rnam par gsungs //
translated: Thus, the qualities of the supreme vajra body are explained as the ma·πá·∏çala of many kinds.

original: gsung gi rdo rje aa sogs ka sogs lha yi rnam pa nyid ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje aa sogs ka sogs lha yi rnam pa nyid ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis //
translated: The vajra speech is the entire form of the deities of the vowels and consonants of the families of the victors.

original: stong pa drug gi thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum gyi srid pa la gnas gtso bo'i rnam pa nyid //
analyzed: stong pa drug gi thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum gyi srid pa la gnas gtso bo'i rnam pa nyid //
translated: The three types of vajra mind of the six emptinesses are the form of the principal one abiding in existence.

original: de bzhin du ni ye shes rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa sna tshogs yum gyi rang bzhin no /
analyzed: de bzhin du ni ye shes rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa sna tshogs yum gyi rang bzhin no /
translated: Likewise, the vajra of pristine consciousness, which conquers the fear of existence, is the nature of the various mothers.

original: 4 / sde pa ka la sogs pa drug po rim pas yongs su bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni rim pa yis //
analyzed: 4 / sde pa ka la sogs pa drug po rim pas yongs su bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni rim pa yis //
translated: The families of the six groups, such as ka, and so on, are completely arranged in order.

original: rdo rje ral gri rin chen 'khor lo chu skyes de bzhin gri gug nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ste //
analyzed: rdo rje ral gri rin chen 'khor lo chu skyes de bzhin gri gug nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ste //
translated: The vajra, sword, jewel, wheel, lotus, and flaying knife are the weapons of the victors.

original: slar yang sde pa re re la yang mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog gi dbye ba lnga rnams dag gis dbye //
analyzed: slar yang sde pa re re la yang mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog gi dbye ba lnga rnams dag gis dbye //
translated: Moreover, each of the classes is divided by the five divisions of the supreme victors.

original: so sor yi ge'i dbye bas dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos po dag las so /
analyzed: so sor yi ge'i dbye bas dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos po dag las so /
translated: They are individually divided by the classes of letters, and by the elements of water, fire, wind, and space.

original: 5 / dang por stong pa'i rab tu dbye ba dag kyang nga nya na ma na dang  thka dang dang po'i dbyangs //
analyzed: 5 / dang por stong pa'i rab tu dbye ba dag kyang nga nya na ma na dang  thka dang dang po'i dbyangs //
translated: The first division is the empty, which is the a, a, a, a, and the first vowel.

original: rlung gi dbye ba ai yig gha dzha dha bha dha sha rnams te me yi dbye ba ri la sogs //
analyzed: rlung gi dbye ba ai yig gha dzha dha bha dha sha rnams te me yi dbye ba ri la sogs //
translated: The wind division is the i, gha, jha, dha, bha, and dha. The fire division is the ri, etc.

original: chu yi dbye bas au yig wa kha tsha tha pha tha wa ste sa yi dbye ba li la sogs //
analyzed: chu yi dbye bas au yig wa kha tsha tha pha tha wa ste sa yi dbye ba li la sogs //
translated: The water division is the u, va, bha, ma, ya, and wa. The earth division is the li, etc.

original: de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i rigs ni rnam pa lnga yi ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams rnam par phye /
analyzed: de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i rigs ni rnam pa lnga yi ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams rnam par phye /
translated: Thus, the classes of ka, etc., are divided into the five types of the supreme victor's family.

original: 6 / gtsug tor stong pa lnga ste rigs gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
analyzed: 6 / gtsug tor stong pa lnga ste rigs gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
translated: 6. The five of the head are empty; the three families are likewise the Vajra of Body, Speech, and Mind.

original: aa sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha ya ra wa la dang ldan pa'i ka sogs sde pa mtha' dag rnams //
analyzed: aa sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha ya ra wa la dang ldan pa'i ka sogs sde pa mtha' dag rnams //
translated: The families of the seals beginning with A, together with the groups beginning with Ka, which are endowed with Ya, Ra, Wa, and La,

original: 'jig rten snang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa lar ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten snang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa lar ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o //
translated: are the mundane, together with the vowels; the supramundane are endowed with Ya, Ra, Wa, and La.

original: rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mtha' dag tu 'gyur ka sogs sde pa brtsegs pa la gnas brgyad rnams so /
analyzed: rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mtha' dag tu 'gyur ka sogs sde pa brtsegs pa la gnas brgyad rnams so /
translated: The lords of the vidya-mantras are all the groups beginning with Ka, which are stacked up and located in the eight directions.

original: 7 / ka sogs yi ge sum cu ha ya ra wa lar ldan ksha dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa drug nyid //
analyzed: 7 / ka sogs yi ge sum cu ha ya ra wa lar ldan ksha dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa drug nyid //
translated: The thirty letters beginning with Ka, together with Ya, Ra, Wa, and La, and with K·π¢a, are thirty-six.

original: dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phye ba ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni 'khor lo'i mgon po rnams su 'gyur //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phye ba ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni 'khor lo'i mgon po rnams su 'gyur //
translated: The thirty-six are divided by the modifications of the vowels, and the rasas are transformed by the rasas, becoming the lords of the wheels.

original: sku ni gcig pa nges par gcig gi 'khor dang bcas pa gnyis ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur //
analyzed: sku ni gcig pa nges par gcig gi 'khor dang bcas pa gnyis ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur //
translated: The one body is definitely one, together with the retinue; the two are embraced by the wisdoms.

original: lnga yi bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang bcas pa dgu ni 'khor lo'i mgon po dgu bdag nyid /
analyzed: lnga yi bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang bcas pa dgu ni 'khor lo'i mgon po dgu bdag nyid /
translated: The fivefold nature of the five, along with the retinue, is the ninefold nature of the nine lords of the wheel.

original: 8 / dbyangs kyi grangs kyi bdag nyid bcu gsum dgu dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsa drug bdag nyid de //
analyzed: 8 / dbyangs kyi grangs kyi bdag nyid bcu gsum dgu dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsa drug bdag nyid de //
translated: The thirteenfold nature of the enumeration of vowels, along with the nine directions, is the thirty-sixfold nature.

original: ya la sogs @81b pa rnams kyis sgo skyong mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni lhag ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so //
analyzed: ya la sogs @81b pa rnams kyis sgo skyong mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni lhag ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so //
translated: The entire group of gatekeepers is by the syllables ya and so on. The remaining vowels are the family of the retinue.

original: khro bo drug tu ha sogs kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogs su gnas rnams rlung gi dbyangs sogs dbye ba yis //
analyzed: khro bo drug tu ha sogs kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogs su gnas rnams rlung gi dbyangs sogs dbye ba yis //
translated: The six wrathful ones are by the syllables ha and so on. The ones abiding in the directions of their own family are the divisions of the vowels of the wind and so on.

original: so sor yi ge'i dbye ba rnams kyis ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud /
analyzed: so sor yi ge'i dbye ba rnams kyis ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud /
translated: The individual divisions of the syllables are the tastes transformed by the tastes of the yoginƒ´s and yogins.

original: 9 / de bzhin yi ge so so ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro yi dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor dbang po ste //
analyzed: 9 / de bzhin yi ge so so ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro yi dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor dbang po ste //
translated: The lord of the ma·πá·∏çala is in the ma·πá·∏çala of the tastes transformed by the individual tastes of the syllables.

original: phung po 'byung ba dbang po la sogs dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: phung po 'byung ba dbang po la sogs dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni sbyang bar bya //
translated: The families of the hosts, all of them, are to be purified by the divisions of the vowels, the aggregates, elements, and sense-organs, and so forth.

original: stong pa gzhom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis ni lha rnams brgya yis gdab pa ste //
analyzed: stong pa gzhom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis ni lha rnams brgya yis gdab pa ste //
translated: The families of the Victors, all of them, beginning with the Void and the Invincible, are to be placed by the hundreds of gods

original: gtsug tor nas ni chu skyes mtha' ru mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gdan la'o /
analyzed: gtsug tor nas ni chu skyes mtha' ru mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gdan la'o /
translated: on the seat in the center of the wheel, in the family of the Unequalled Equal, from the top-knot to the lotus.

original: 10 / rdo rje rnams kyis zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rnams dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis //
analyzed: 10 / rdo rje rnams kyis zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rnams dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis //
translated: The divisions of the faces are by the vajras, and the hands of the Lord of Victors are by the divisions of the vowels.

original: de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan yang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis //
analyzed: de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan yang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis //
translated: By those very [vowels] the divisions of the seals are also, likewise, by the vajras of body and so forth.

original: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can //
translated: The Yoga Tantras, thirty-six of them, have the divisions of many syllables, of immeasurable good qualities.

original: yi ge so so'i ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lha mo dang ni lha rnams dag gi'o /
analyzed: yi ge so so'i ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lha mo dang ni lha rnams dag gi'o /
translated: The gods and goddesses have the names of the individual syllables, in the equal and unequal families.

original: 11 / sa bon gcig pu dpa' bo gcig pa rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur //
analyzed: 11 / sa bon gcig pu dpa' bo gcig pa rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur //
translated: The single seed, the single hero, equal in taste to the atom, is embraced by the pure wisdoms.

original: phung po rnams kyis lnga yi bdag nyid sa yi khams sogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dgu pa yang //
analyzed: phung po rnams kyis lnga yi bdag nyid sa yi khams sogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dgu pa yang //
translated: The fivefold nature of the aggregates, consecrated by the earth element, etc., is the ninth.

original: bshang lam la sogs dang ni mig la sogs pas yongs bskor 'di ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyang //
analyzed: bshang lam la sogs dang ni mig la sogs pas yongs bskor 'di ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyang //
translated: Surrounded by the anus, etc., and the eyes, etc., it is also the nature of the twenty-five.

original: de bzhin so ni rab tu skyes pa slar yang so rnams dag gis dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can /
analyzed: de bzhin so ni rab tu skyes pa slar yang so rnams dag gis dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can /
translated: Likewise, the fully arisen teeth are again the lord of the teeth, the infinite lord of the wheel.

original: 12 / dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu las ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar padma'i mtshan ma 'od dpag med //
analyzed: 12 / dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu las ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar padma'i mtshan ma 'od dpag med //
translated: The pure, perfectly pure, from the water of purity, is the white sign of the lotus, AmitƒÅbha.

original: nga rgyal 'jig rten dbang phyug rta yi shing rtas 'gro ma m'a ma k'i dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma ;
analyzed: nga rgyal 'jig rten dbang phyug rta yi shing rtas 'gro ma m'a ma k'i dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma ;

analyzed: / drag mo chu gter tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis skyes gdengs can dang ni stag gdong ma dang 'ug par bcas //
translated: The fierce one, the host of waters, the lord of the hosts, the two-born nƒÅga, and the tiger-faced one with the owl,

analyzed: 'di dag dpal ldan g-yon gyi zhal nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni rdo rje can gyis spros pa'o /

analyzed: 13 / chos la yang dag dag pa'i rlung las phyag gi padma ral gri don yod grub pa sgrol @82a * //
translated: From the wind of the pure Dharma, the lotus hand, the sword, Amoghasiddhi, and TƒÅrƒÅ,

analyzed: ma dang // mkha' yi snying po reg bya rdo rje ma dang shin tu stobs bcas tsa rtsi k'a dang lcags sgrog ma //
translated: ƒÄkƒÅ≈õagarbha, the vajra of touch, and Ca·πá·∏çƒ´ with great strength, and also Caurƒ´ and PƒÅ·πá·∏çaravƒÅsinƒ´,

original: bden bral dang ni rlung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyi gdong ma dang bya rog bcas //
analyzed: bden bral dang ni rlung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyi gdong ma dang bya rog bcas //
translated: Nair·πõtƒ´ and the wind, the ≈õ≈´dra, the nƒÅga, and also ≈övƒÅnavaktrƒÅ and KƒÅkƒ´,

analyzed: sa yi snying po rmugs byed dang ni ro mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo gdong drug me yi lha //
translated: K·π£itigarbha, DhupavajrƒÅ, RƒÅva·πáƒ´, VajralƒÅsyƒÅ, and also ·π¢a·πá·πáak·π£atrak·πõt, the fire god,

original: gdengs can dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab gsal khro gnyer can dang phag gdong ma dang bya rgod bcas //
analyzed: gdengs can dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab gsal khro gnyer can dang phag gdong ma dang bya rgod bcas //
translated: The two royal families of the lords of the serpents, the two of the radiant ones, the wrathful one, the pig-faced one, and the vulture-faced one.

original: 'di dag dpal ldan g-yas kyi zhal nas mchog gi dga' ba yis ni sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o /
analyzed: 'di dag dpal ldan g-yas kyi zhal nas mchog gi dga' ba yis ni sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o /
translated: These are emanated from the right face of the glorious one by the chief of the various ones with supreme joy.

analyzed: 15 / lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i thub pa phyag na 'khor lo dang // spyan ma dang ni rnam par sel ba rab mchog mi yi bdag po rengs byed dri yi rdo rje ma //
translated: At the navel, from the pure stage, the sage with a golden complexion like the supreme one, the wheel-holder, and LocanƒÅ, the supreme one, the lord of men, the paralyzer, and GandhavajrƒÅ.

original: 'od zer can dang dbang mo brgya byin dus kyi gdong pa dang bcas rje rigs klu la sogs pa kun //
analyzed: 'od zer can dang dbang mo brgya byin dus kyi gdong pa dang bcas rje rigs klu la sogs pa kun //
translated: The radiant one, the powerful one, Indra, and the one with the face of time, all of the nƒÅga class, and so on.

original: gtso bo yis ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan rnams spros pa'o /
analyzed: gtso bo yis ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan rnams spros pa'o /
translated: The chief one emanates the benefactors for all beings from the western face with equanimity.

original: 16 / gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni phyag na mchog gi rdo rje mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
analyzed: 16 / gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni phyag na mchog gi rdo rje mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
translated: From the pure u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a stage, the supreme vajra-holder, Ak·π£obhya, and the queen of the realm.

original: gtsug tor dang ni chos kyi dbyings te nam mkha'i yon tan dbang gis phyag na rdo rje la sogs gzhan //
analyzed: gtsug tor dang ni chos kyi dbyings te nam mkha'i yon tan dbang gis phyag na rdo rje la sogs gzhan //
translated: The crown of the head and the sphere of dharma are the qualities of space, and VajrapƒÅ·πái and the others are the others.

original: gsang bar dag pa las ni mtha' dag bde mnyam ster rnams sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang //
analyzed: gsang bar dag pa las ni mtha' dag bde mnyam ster rnams sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang //
translated: In the secret, from the pure, all the bestowers of the bliss of equality are the sound-vajra women and so forth.

original: steng dang 'og tu yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru spros pa'o /
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru spros pa'o /
translated: Above and below, the places of many qualities, are spread out as the cause of liberation for living beings.

original: 17 / phyogs kyi 'dab mar spyan ma la sogs phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste //
analyzed: 17 / phyogs kyi 'dab mar spyan ma la sogs phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste //
translated: In the cardinal directions on the petals are LocanƒÅ and so forth, and in the intermediate directions on the petals are skulls filled with blood.

original: nyi ma'i steng du g-yon brkyang au ma dang bcas dbang phyug mnan zhing 'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin dang mtshungs //
analyzed: nyi ma'i steng du g-yon brkyang au ma dang bcas dbang phyug mnan zhing 'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin dang mtshungs //
translated: On a sun [disk] is the left leg extended, and with UmƒÅ, ≈öiva is suppressed, and he is similar to a cloud at the time of destruction.

original: thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba bcings shing chu yi gter gyi zhal dang nyi ma'i phyag ldan he ru ka //
analyzed: thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba bcings shing chu yi gter gyi zhal dang nyi ma'i phyag ldan he ru ka //
translated: He is bound by a garland of skulls, has a face of the ocean, and has hands of the sun. He is Heruka.

original: phyag rgya sbrul dang stag gi pags pa mi bzad glang po'i bdag po'i pags pa rlon pa bshus pa 'dzin /
analyzed: phyag rgya sbrul dang stag gi pags pa mi bzad glang po'i bdag po'i pags pa rlon pa bshus pa 'dzin /
translated: The mudras are the skins of snakes, tigers, and elephants, and the fresh skin of the lord of elephants.

original: 18 / gnag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus lha mo rnams kyi phyi @82b rol du ni 'khor lo gsum //
analyzed: 18 / gnag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus lha mo rnams kyi phyi @82b rol du ni 'khor lo gsum //
translated: The three wheels are black, red, and white, and the goddesses are outside the bodies.

original: rdo rje drug ni khro bo las skyes phyag gnyis zla zhal rnams dang de bzhin 'byung po skyes rnams kyis //
analyzed: rdo rje drug ni khro bo las skyes phyag gnyis zla zhal rnams dang de bzhin 'byung po skyes rnams kyis //
translated: The six vajras are born from the wrathful ones, and the two-armed ones have moon faces.

original: sgor ni gtum mo ro la gnas shing phyag na gri gug thod pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro //
analyzed: sgor ni gtum mo ro la gnas shing phyag na gri gug thod pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro //
translated: In the corners are Ca·πá·∏çƒÅlƒ´ and Pukkasƒ´, standing on corpses, with skull-cups and flaying knives.

original: dpa' bo rnams kyis rig byed phyag na rdo rje da ma du dang dril bu rdo rje kha tv'am ga /
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams kyis rig byed phyag na rdo rje da ma du dang dril bu rdo rje kha tv'am ga /
translated: The heroes hold the Vedas, and VajrapƒÅ·πái holds a ·∏çamaru and a bell.

original: 19 / dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs brgyad du ni sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun te //
analyzed: 19 / dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs brgyad du ni sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun te //
translated: The glorious Meru has eight directions, with the earth and water ma·πá·∏çalas, and the abodes and the neighboring abodes.

original: zhing dang tshan  po ha dang 'dus pa can dang dur khrod sa ni me dang rlung gi dbus su yang //
analyzed: zhing dang tshan  po ha dang 'dus pa can dang dur khrod sa ni me dang rlung gi dbus su yang //
translated: The fields, the charnel grounds, and the places of assembly are in the middle of fire and wind.

original: de bzhin yul dang grong khyer la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba ste //
analyzed: de bzhin yul dang grong khyer la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba ste //
translated: Likewise, the gods are to be known as abiding in the directions and the intermediate directions of the country and the city.

original: shes rab rgyud kyi mngon par brjod pa srid pa gsum gyi bla mas shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o /
analyzed: shes rab rgyud kyi mngon par brjod pa srid pa gsum gyi bla mas shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o /
translated: This is the spreading of the eastern face of the Lord of the Three Existences, the explanatory tantra of the Wisdom Section.

original: 20 / snying por 'khor lo cha dgu pa ste dkyil 'khor las ni phyed kyi cha shas zla nyi padma la //
analyzed: 20 / snying por 'khor lo cha dgu pa ste dkyil 'khor las ni phyed kyi cha shas zla nyi padma la //
translated: The essence is the nine-part wheel, and from the mandala, half of the parts are the moon, sun, and lotus.

original: rdo rje ka ba'i phreng ba dag gis spras pa yang ni phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen po //
analyzed: rdo rje ka ba'i phreng ba dag gis spras pa yang ni phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen po //
translated: The garland of vajra pillars is adorned with the great gods of the aggregates and elements.

original: phyi rol du ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la yul dang yul can zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la gnas //
analyzed: phyi rol du ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la yul dang yul can zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la gnas //
translated: Outside, on the walls of the enclosure, the objects and subjects are seated on moon and sun seats.

original: sgo skyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni kha khyer dag la kun nas so /
analyzed: sgo skyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni kha khyer dag la kun nas so /
translated: The gate guardians are seated on suns, and the other hosts of the family are all around on the ledges.

original: 21 /'di la sogs pa la ni de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud kyang 'dus pa rnam pa drug tu gsungs pa ste //
analyzed: 21 /'di la sogs pa la ni de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud kyang 'dus pa rnam pa drug tu gsungs pa ste //
translated: Here and so forth, the Yoga Tantra is also included in the sixfold collection.

original: zur du khro bo rnams dang logs su yul dang yul can jam bha la ni phyag na so ba bsnams //
analyzed: zur du khro bo rnams dang logs su yul dang yul can jam bha la ni phyag na so ba bsnams //
translated: The wrathful deities are in the corners, and Jambhala, the lord of wealth, is in the direction of the northeast, holding a tooth-staff in his hand.

original: ngag dang rkang lag bshang lam bha ga nyi ma ri bong can rnams dus kyi rtsa yi rang bzhin te //
analyzed: ngag dang rkang lag bshang lam bha ga nyi ma ri bong can rnams dus kyi rtsa yi rang bzhin te //
translated: Speech, hands, anus, vagina, sun, moon, and the channels of the time are the nature.

original: shes rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan g-yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o /
analyzed: shes rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan g-yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o /
translated: All of wisdom and method are the three faces, the hands of the taste, and the emanation from the right face.

original: 22 / snying por 'khor lo chu gter zung du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor las ni gsum gyi cha //
analyzed: 22 / snying por 'khor lo chu gter zung du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor las ni gsum gyi cha //
translated: In the center, the wheel and the ocean are the pair, and the lord of men is one-third of the mandala.

original: phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'phar ma gzhan la sgra yi rdo rje la sogs brgyad //
analyzed: phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'phar ma gzhan la sgra yi rdo rje la sogs brgyad //
translated: The aggregates and elements are the supreme deities, and again, on the other floors, the eight beginning with ≈öabdavajrƒÅ.

original: phyi rol du gnas dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs bcur bkod pa nyi ma la gnas khro bo'i tshogs rnams te //
analyzed: phyi rol du gnas dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs bcur bkod pa nyi ma la gnas khro bo'i tshogs rnams te //
translated: The wrathful hosts are arranged in the outer directions in the mandala, abiding in the sun.

original: der ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la dus la chu gter gyis bsnun byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag rnams /
analyzed: der ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la dus la chu gter gyis bsnun byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag rnams /
translated: There, on the walls of the enclosure, are all the bodhisattvas, struck by the ocean at the time.

original: 23 / sgyu 'phrul dra ba dbye ba gsum ste zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni lha yi sku yi dbye ba las //
analyzed: 23 / sgyu 'phrul dra ba dbye ba gsum ste zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni lha yi sku yi dbye ba las //
translated: The net of illusion is divided into three parts: the three faces, the faces of the three tastes, and the division of the body of the deity.

original: rtog pa la sogs gang @83a * //
analyzed: rtog pa la sogs gang @83a * //
translated: All the concepts, etc.,

original: yin mtha' dag blun po'i snying gi dbang gis g-yon gyi zhal nas spros pa'o //
analyzed: yin mtha' dag blun po'i snying gi dbang gis g-yon gyi zhal nas spros pa'o //
translated: are emanated from the left face by the power of the foolish heart.

original: rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa'i rgyud dang 'dir ni nyis 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa'i rgyud dang 'dir ni nyis 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi //
translated: The Yoginƒ´-tantra and this [Hevajra-tantra] are the great union of the two, emanated from the western face by the ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´s,

original: 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug mi bdag dur khrod sa rnams kyis ni nub kyi zhal nas spros pa'o /
analyzed: 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug mi bdag dur khrod sa rnams kyis ni nub kyi zhal nas spros pa'o /
translated: with the six wheels, the six clans, the six lords of men, and the six charnel grounds.

original: 24 / thig ni drug dang bug pa'i cha shas g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thig btab nas //
analyzed: 24 / thig ni drug dang bug pa'i cha shas g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thig btab nas //
translated: Having laid out the lines of the mandala with the six lines and the moving parts of the apertures,

original: snying po las ni drug drug cha rnams kyis te padma'i 'dab ma phyed kyis lte bar ldan pa yang //
analyzed: snying po las ni drug drug cha rnams kyis te padma'i 'dab ma phyed kyis lte bar ldan pa yang //
translated: the six parts of the essence, with half a lotus petal, and the navel,

original: gri gug 'khor lo chu skyes rin chen ral gri mchog gi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis //
analyzed: gri gug 'khor lo chu skyes rin chen ral gri mchog gi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis //
translated: with two parts each of the two rows of the vajra garland of the supreme vajra, the flaying knife, wheel, lotus, jewel, and sword,

original: nyi ma rnams kyis sgo dang sgo khyud dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang kha khyer dang ni do shal sa /
analyzed: nyi ma rnams kyis sgo dang sgo khyud dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang kha khyer dang ni do shal sa /
translated: The sun is the door and door frame, and the directions and tastes are the ledges and garlands.

original: 25 / gsum gyis kyang ni ra ba lnga yi re kh'a rtse mo can gyis do shal rtsa bar snam bu'o //
analyzed: 25 / gsum gyis kyang ni ra ba lnga yi re kh'a rtse mo can gyis do shal rtsa bar snam bu'o //
translated: The three are the fence, the five are the parapet, and the crest is the garland, the base cloth.

original: nyi ma rnams kyis logs dang 'gram ste sum 'gyur nyin byed rnams kyis ka ba'i steng du rta babs so //
analyzed: nyi ma rnams kyis logs dang 'gram ste sum 'gyur nyin byed rnams kyis ka ba'i steng du rta babs so //
translated: The sides and corners are the sun, and the upper beam of the pillar is the pediment.

original: phyogs dang phyogs bral  dag tu sgo ni brgyad rnams bya ste dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum po'o //
analyzed: phyogs dang phyogs bral  dag tu sgo ni brgyad rnams bya ste dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum po'o //
translated: The doors are eight in the directions and the intermediate directions. This great ma·πá·∏çala is round.

original: dbus su chu skyes sna tshogs mdog ste lte ba la ni nyi ma ri bong can dag sbyar ba'i gdan /
analyzed: dbus su chu skyes sna tshogs mdog ste lte ba la ni nyi ma ri bong can dag sbyar ba'i gdan /
translated: In the center is the multicolored lotus, and in the center of that is the seat of the sun and moon joined.

original: 26 /'khor lo dang ni phreng ba sngon po  sa ni ljang gu dag dang sa gzhi nag po 'khor lo ser //
analyzed: 26 /'khor lo dang ni phreng ba sngon po  sa ni ljang gu dag dang sa gzhi nag po 'khor lo ser //
translated: The wheel and garland are blue, the earth is green, and the ground is black.

original: sa gzhi dmar la 'khor lo dkar dang sa ni dkar po phreng bar bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang // sa ni ser po sngon po dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dang ni ljang gu'i mdog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: sa gzhi dmar la 'khor lo dkar dang sa ni dkar po phreng bar bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang // sa ni ser po sngon po dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dang ni ljang gu'i mdog tu 'gyur //
translated: the ground is yellow, blue, not white, and green.

original: cha drug gis ni mtshon gyi sa ste skyed byed zhal gyi dbang gis sgo yi 'khor lo de bzhin no /
analyzed: cha drug gis ni mtshon gyi sa ste skyed byed zhal gyi dbang gis sgo yi 'khor lo de bzhin no /
translated: The ground of the weapon is indicated by the six parts, and the door wheel is the same by the power of the face.

original: 27 / phyi rol du ni brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad //
analyzed: 27 / phyi rol du ni brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad //
translated: Outside are the eight pairs of charnel grounds, and by the power of the family, the eight essence goddesses.

original: 'dab ma la ni thod pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa brgyad de 'dab ma brgyad la lha mo rnams //
analyzed: 'dab ma la ni thod pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa brgyad de 'dab ma brgyad la lha mo rnams //
translated: On the petals are the eight skull cups with the taste of nectar, and on the eight petals are the goddesses.

original: phyir ni sgeg mo la sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas de bzhin /
analyzed: phyir ni sgeg mo la sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas de bzhin /
translated: Outside are the goddesses beginning with LƒÅsyƒÅ in the directions and intermediate directions.

original: klu yi rgyal po brgyad //
analyzed: klu yi rgyal po brgyad //
translated: There are eight nƒÅga kings.

original: de yi phyi rol du ni sa chu me dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang rdo rje'i phreng ba'o /
analyzed: de yi phyi rol du ni sa chu me dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang rdo rje'i phreng ba'o /
translated: Outside of that are the ma·πá·∏çalas of earth, water, fire, and wind, and the vajra fence.

original: 28 / ring po thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta pa ta tsa ka la sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams //
analyzed: 28 / ring po thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta pa ta tsa ka la sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams //
translated: The long vowels are the letters sa, ta, pa, ca, and so on, which are the nature of the elements earth and so on.üîΩThe short vowels are the letters sa, ta, pa, ca, and so on, which are the nature of the elements earth and so on.üîΩThe short vowels are the letters sa, ta, pa, ca, and so on, which are the nature of the elements earth and so on.

translated: The long vowels are the letters sa, ta, pa, ca, and so on, which are the nature of the elements earth and so on.üîΩThe short vowels are the letters sa, ta, pa, ca, and so

original: rkang pa rked pa dpral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin pa lag par g-yer ka sogs dang rus pa'i rgya //
analyzed: rkang pa rked pa dpral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin pa lag par g-yer ka sogs dang rus pa'i rgya //
translated: Anklets, waist-band, forehead-ornament, earrings, necklace, bracelets,

original: mgo dang rked pa'i ngos la thod pa'i dum bu rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog lnga yi phreng ba'o /üîΩ30 / mkha' 'gro zhal gnyis phyag na rdo rje mchog dang da ma ru dang rdo rje kha tv'am ga dril bu //
analyzed: mgo dang rked pa'i ngos la thod pa'i dum bu rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog lnga yi phreng ba'o / 30 / mkha' 'gro zhal gnyis phyag na rdo rje mchog dang da ma ru dang rdo rje kha tv'am ga dril bu //
translated: and bone-garland on the head, waist, and both sides of the neck.üîΩThe two-faced dakini holds a vajra, a damaru, a kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga, and a bell.

original: mgrin pa dpal ldan mgo phreng mgo bor cod pan la yang rdo rje dar dbyangs dang ni nor bu'o //
analyzed: mgrin pa dpal ldan mgo phreng mgo bor cod pan la yang rdo rje dar dbyangs dang ni nor bu'o //
translated: The glorious garland of heads is on the neck, and on the head is a vajra, a silk ribbon, and a jewel.

original: dpal ldan mgul rgyan rkang la rkang gdub phyag la phyag gdub dang ni ska rags dag dang rna rgyan te //
analyzed: dpal ldan mgul rgyan rkang la rkang gdub phyag la phyag gdub dang ni ska rags dag dang rna rgyan te //
translated: The glorious necklace, anklets on the feet, bracelets on the wrists, a belt, and earrings,

original: rdzogs pa'i thod pa rnams kyi phreng ba mche ba can gyi mtha' dag lus la gnas dang thal ba'i rgya /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i thod pa rnams kyi phreng ba mche ba can gyi mtha' dag lus la gnas dang thal ba'i rgya /
translated: and a garland of complete skulls, all over the body, and a mark of ashes.

original: 31 / gtso bo'i dbu la thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mgrin par gdong brgya rnams kyis mgo yi phreng ba'o //
analyzed: 31 / gtso bo'i dbu la thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mgrin par gdong brgya rnams kyis mgo yi phreng ba'o //
translated: On the head of the principal one, a garland of skulls, and on the neck, a garland of a hundred heads.

original: zla phyed rdo rje'i cod pan la ste rang gi rked dang phyag gnas stag lpags glang po'i pags pa'o //
analyzed: zla phyed rdo rje'i cod pan la ste rang gi rked dang phyag gnas stag lpags glang po'i pags pa'o //
translated: The half-moon is the crest-jewel, and the tiger-skin and elephant-skin are on his hips and arms.

original: zla nyi bsreg za'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhabs kyi rtsa bar bdud dang dbang ldan lus la thal ba ste //üîΩphyag rgya klu yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' 'gro ma la 'o dag byed /
analyzed: zla nyi bsreg za'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhabs kyi rtsa bar bdud dang dbang ldan lus la thal ba ste // phyag rgya klu yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' 'gro ma la 'o dag byed /
translated: The sun and moon are the disks of the navel and feet, and the ash is on the body of the demons and lords of the directions.üîΩThe mudras are the lords of the nagas, and the dakinis wail at the top of the eon, which is like the end of time.

original: 32 / phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lag pa da ma ru dang rdo rje kha tv'am ga nyid de //
analyzed: 32 / phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lag pa da ma ru dang rdo rje kha tv'am ga nyid de //
translated: In the cardinal directions are the dakinis, with damarus and khatva-ngas in their hands.

original: bshang gci khrag dang mi sha rnams kyis phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khu ba'i snod kyang phyag na'o //
analyzed: bshang gci khrag dang mi sha rnams kyis phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khu ba'i snod kyang phyag na'o //
translated: In the intermediate directions are the bowls of semen, with excrement, urine, blood, and human flesh.

original: de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang kun nas gnyi ga bde la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang kun nas gnyi ga bde la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: Likewise, the eight goddesses are in the wheel, all of them in union with the two joys.

original: ser dang dkar po dmar po'i mdog dang nag po ljang gu'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang phyogs su /
analyzed: ser dang dkar po dmar po'i mdog dang nag po ljang gu'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang phyogs su /
translated: Yellow, white, red, black, green, and blue bodies are in their own directions.

original: 33 / rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la gtso bo'i kha dog mtshan ma rnams ni sngar bzhin spyan gsum dag gi tshogs //
analyzed: 33 / rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la gtso bo'i kha dog mtshan ma rnams ni sngar bzhin spyan gsum dag gi tshogs //
translated: The colors and signs of the chief deities in the families of the Victorious Ones who give birth are as before, with three eyes and so forth.

original: phan tshun du ni 'khyud pa dag kyang rang gzhan rigs kyi dbang gis rig par bya ste kun nas so //
analyzed: phan tshun du ni 'khyud pa dag kyang rang gzhan rigs kyi dbang gis rig par bya ste kun nas so //
translated: They embrace each other, and one should know that this is according to their own and others‚Äô families.

original: sbyin pa sogs dang @84a * //
analyzed: sbyin pa sogs dang @84a * //
translated: The goddesses of generosity and so forth,

original: phung po 'byung ba yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang bo lnga la sogs pa dang // phyogs sa phyogs kyi stobs dang dpal ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par sbyang bar bya /
analyzed: phung po 'byung ba yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang bo lnga la sogs pa dang // phyogs sa phyogs kyi stobs dang dpal ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par sbyang bar bya /
translated: the elements, the aggregates, the sense objects and faculties, and so forth, and the powerful sons of the Victorious Ones, should all purify the goddesses.

original: 34 / lhun po'i phyogs su dbye ba brgyad kyi phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang // zhing dang tshan  do ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa dang khyim ni rlung gi phyed kyi mtshams su ste //
analyzed: 34 / lhun po'i phyogs su dbye ba brgyad kyi phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang // zhing dang tshan  do ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa dang khyim ni rlung gi phyed kyi mtshams su ste //
translated: In the directions of Mount Meru, in the eight directions and the intermediate directions, in the abodes and the neighboring abodes, in the fields, in the forests, in the charnel grounds, and in the houses, in the intermediate directions of the winds,

original: 'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyi ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang // nus dang gtso bo nyin gcig rigs ldan ma ni rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab tu rgyu ba las /üîΩ35 / rgyab tu lha mo dbang byed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te //üîΩrlung dang dbang ldan lha min me dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gnod sbyin nub tu yang //üîΩgtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lte ba dang ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la //
analyzed: 'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyi ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang // nus dang gtso bo nyin gcig rigs ldan ma ni rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab tu rgyu ba las / 35 / rgyab tu lha mo dbang byed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te // rlung dang dbang ldan lha min me dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gnod sbyin nub tu yang // gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lte ba dang ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la //
