translated: He teaches the Dharma of the three times‚Äîthe past, the future, and the present‚Äîto animals, hungry ghosts, demigods, mahoragas, gods, humans, and noble beings such as bodhisattvas.

original: rang rang skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po mtshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa //
analyzed: rang rang skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po mtshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa //
translated: He teaches the Dharma of the three times in the languages of each of these beings, and he establishes them on the unerring path.

original: 'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yin no /
analyzed: 'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yin no /
translated: This is the speech of the Omniscient One, which bestows the fruit of the bliss of perfect peace, not the speech of the gods.

original: 97 / sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtogs bya min pa dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni //
analyzed: 97 / sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtogs bya min pa dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni //
translated: The emanations of the Buddha, which are endowed with infinite qualities and are not even to be realized by the buddhas, are like magical illusions.

original: srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston par byed de brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o //
analyzed: srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston par byed de brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o //
translated: He shows himself in the three worlds, like Indra in the bow.

original: sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab zhugs pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab zhugs pa //
translated: The various things, along with the Victor, enter into the minds of each of the gods and men.

original: 'di ni ma skyes chos te chu la nam mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o /
analyzed: 'di ni ma skyes chos te chu la nam mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o /
translated: This is the unproduced dharma, which here gives rise to the error of production, like space in water.

original: 98 / @90b rgyal ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyi bgrod bya min pa rnam pa thams cad pa //
analyzed: 98 / @90b rgyal ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyi bgrod bya min pa rnam pa thams cad pa //
translated: The body vajra of the Victor is the object of all the objects and subjects.

original: gsung gi rdo rje sems can thams cad rang snying skad rnams dag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje sems can thams cad rang snying skad rnams dag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o //
translated: The speech vajra of the Victor is the understanding of the dharma by all sentient beings with their own languages.

original: rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dag sa la gnas //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dag sa la gnas //
translated: The mind vajra of the Victor is the nature of the minds of all sentient beings abiding in the stages.

original: dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o /
analyzed: dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o /
translated: The wisdom vajra of the Victor is the apprehender of all things, which is stainless like a jewel.

original: 99 / sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras ster drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu po de dag rnams su gsungs //
analyzed: 99 / sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras ster drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu po de dag rnams su gsungs //
translated: These are the ten powers of the bodhisattva, which are said to be the six of generosity, etc., and the four of the knowledge of what is possible and impossible, etc.

original: de dag rnams kyi thabs ni dag pa mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi thabs ni dag pa mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams //
translated: The method of these is the tenfold supreme purity, the vase filled with the mind.

original: bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams //
analyzed: bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams //
translated: The demons, the defilements, the fall, the desire, the thief, the vajra-group, the tree, etc.

original: phyag rgya drug rnams stong pa drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o /
analyzed: phyag rgya drug rnams stong pa drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o /
translated: The six seals are the six voidnesses, the producer of the three worlds is the consciousness of intuition.

original: 100 /'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang ba zhes pa bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni //
analyzed: 100 /'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang ba zhes pa bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni //
translated: The wheel is the illumination of the three worlds, the gem of bliss is the lotus of passion.

original: padma'o nyon mongs zad pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: padma'o nyon mongs zad pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o //
translated: The sword is the exhaustion of the afflictions, the vajra is the great body of intuition, the indivisible.

original: mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa //
translated: The curved knife is the cutting off of ignorance. These are the six supreme families.

original: phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya /
analyzed: phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya /
translated: The aggregates, elements, faculties, and so forth are of the same taste as space.

original: 101 / gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs //
analyzed: 101 / gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs //
translated: The form of the family is said to be the great form, in which the form of the family is lost.

original: gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste //
analyzed: gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste //
translated: The great feeling is said to be the feeling in which the suffering of samsara is lost.

original: gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o //
analyzed: gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o //
translated: The great vajra perception is the perception in which the perception of samsara is lost.

original: gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag ni rdo rje'i 'du byed kho na'o /
analyzed: gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag ni rdo rje'i 'du byed kho na'o /
translated: The great vajra formations are the formations in which the increase of samsara is lost.

original: 102 / gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs //
analyzed: 102 / gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs //
translated: The great consciousness is the consciousness in which the states of sleep and so forth are lost.

original: gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid //
analyzed: gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid //
translated: The wisdom of the Sage is the thing that is not consciousness in which the thing that is not consciousness is lost.

original: 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams //
analyzed: 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams //
translated: These are the six supreme victors, Vairochana and so forth, the six families.

original: gzhan gyi khams drug dbye ba rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams /üîΩ103 / gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa @91a * //
analyzed: gzhan gyi khams drug dbye ba rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams / 103 / gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa @91a * //
translated: The six other elements are the divisions, earth, water, fire, wind, space, and peace.

original: nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin ma'o //
analyzed: nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin ma'o //
translated: Where all delusion is destroyed, that is Locana, she is the earth.

original: gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa m'a ma k'i ste de ni chu nyid do //üîΩgang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa gos dkar mo ste de ni me yin no //üîΩgang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol ma yin te de ni rlung yang ngo /
analyzed: gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa m'a ma k'i ste de ni chu nyid do // gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa gos dkar mo ste de ni me yin no // gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol ma yin te de ni rlung yang ngo /
translated: Where all pride is destroyed, that is Mamaki, she is water.üîΩWhere all passion is destroyed, that is PƒÅ·πá·∏çaravƒÅsinƒ´, she is fire.üîΩWhere all envy is destroyed, that is TƒÅrƒÅ, she is wind.

original: 104 / gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha' //
analyzed: 104 / gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha' //
translated: Where all hatred is destroyed, that is VajradhƒÅtvƒ´≈õvarƒ´, she is space.

original: gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med do //
analyzed: gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med do //
translated: The mother of the variety of all miserliness is the destruction of miserliness itself, and that is unchanging.üîΩThe eye is that which sees visible forms, whether seen or unseen, in the mind and in space.

original: mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig / ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o /
analyzed: mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig / ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o /
translated: The great ear of the Victor is that which hears sound from afar, as if it were very clear.

original: 105 / mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po //
analyzed: 105 / mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po //
translated: The excellent nose of the all-pervading lord is that which smells all fragrances that produce supreme bliss.

original: rang gis zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yin de ni lce //
analyzed: rang gis zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yin de ni lce //
translated: The tongue is that which always tastes the nectar of the moon, which bestows bliss.

original: rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste //
analyzed: rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste //
translated: The organ of the vajra body is that which always seizes the vajra touch.

original: thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni 'di yi chos /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni 'di yi chos /
translated: The mind is that which enters the bliss of equality through the company of method and wisdom. That is its dharma.

original: 106 / dbye ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams //
analyzed: 106 / dbye ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams //
translated: These objects and subjects, divided into six kinds, are the domain of the Bodhisattvas and their consorts.

original: gzugs la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni //
analyzed: gzugs la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni //
translated: These forms and so forth are the sixfold domain of the supreme Victor.

original: dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste //
analyzed: dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste //
translated: They are pure, unborn, unceasing, the supreme bliss, unstained, and to be realized by wisdom.

original: khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min /
analyzed: khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min /
translated: They are not to be grasped by others in the three realms, nor are they to be realized by the sense faculties of all beings.

original: 107 / ye shes dgug par byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis //
analyzed: 107 / ye shes dgug par byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis //
translated: Here, the power of wisdom is further increased by the summoning, and it is penetrated by the stupefying binding.

original: rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang //
analyzed: rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang //
translated: The paralyzing is the binding, and it is satisfied by the swelling through the power of supreme bliss.

original: ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo ro ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo ro ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste //
translated: The vajra speed causes the wheel taste to be equal in the wheels of wisdom.

original: de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o /
analyzed: de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o /
translated: Likewise, the wrathful goddesses are in the body of the Yoginƒ´ Tantra, clearly and certainly.

original: 108 / srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste //
analyzed: 108 / srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste //
translated: In the abode of the three worlds, the demons are certainly struck by Nƒ´lada·πá·∏ça.

original: bcing ba khro bo mi g-yo dus @91b mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab //
analyzed: bcing ba khro bo mi g-yo dus @91b mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab //
translated: The binding is done by the wrathful Acala, who is like the sun at the end of time, with infinite effort, with the kƒ´la.

original: 'dod pas de yis brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'dod pas de yis brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so //
translated: By that, desire is destroyed. The one who is on the ground, who is paralyzed, is done by Sumbha.

original: gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ;
analyzed: gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ;
translated: The one who is in the crown, who is destroyed by magic, is clearly and certainly, as before, the wrathful goddesses.

original: 109 / yi dags rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas tsa rtsi k'a la sogs pa spros par gyur pa ste //
analyzed: 109 / yi dags rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas tsa rtsi k'a la sogs pa spros par gyur pa ste //
translated: Then, for the sake of ripening the pretas, Ca·πá·∏çƒÅlƒ´ and so on are emanated.

original: skye bo rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du //
analyzed: skye bo rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du //
translated: For the sake of protecting beings, Indra and so on are in the directions and the intermediate directions.

original: klu rnams smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros //
analyzed: klu rnams smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros //
translated: For the sake of ripening the nƒÅgas, the vajra-holder certainly emanates all the nƒÅga families.

original: lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la sogs rnams kyang spros /
analyzed: lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la sogs rnams kyang spros /
translated: For the sake of ripening the asuras, he also emanates MahƒÅ≈õvƒÅnabhak·π£a and so on.

original: 110 / gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar //
analyzed: 110 / gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar //
translated: Whatever other emanations there are, they arise in the ma·πá·∏çala of the lord, born from the elementals.

original: sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya //
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings, these many supreme qualities should be known in one‚Äôs body.

original: de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste //
translated: Likewise, the many tantras and mantras that exist in the families are the divisions of yoginƒ´s and yogins.

original: 'di ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o /
analyzed: 'di ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o /
translated: This is also the two types of empowerment, mundane and supramundane, due to the qualities of the son.

original: 111 / gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin dang // shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang //
analyzed: 111 / gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin dang // shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang //
translated: The one who touches the breast of Wisdom, the one who tastes the nectar of the other, the one who embraces, the one who, with Wisdom as companion, melts the Bodhisattva, the one who realizes the nectar of the fourth moment,

original: de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan //
analyzed: de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan //
translated: all these are certainly worldly, taught as the cause of the path by supreme compassion.

original: 'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o /
translated: The one who is in the state of transcendence, who is united with the supreme seal of the Lord of Conquerors,

original: 112 / sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid //
analyzed: 112 / sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid //
translated: is merely a mental appearance, born of his own mind, like a reflection in a mirror.

original: gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste //
analyzed: gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste //
translated: The one who is served by all the Bodhisattvas and Buddhas, is the one to be served by the Lord of Yogins.

original: ye shes me lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing //
analyzed: ye shes me lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing //
translated: The flame of his gnosis burns up the entire army of Mara together with their domain.

original: lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed /
analyzed: lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed /
translated: The body, which bestows the bliss of equality to the yogis through the practice of years, is also attached, and so forth.

original: 113 / shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur //üîΩdbang @92a * //
analyzed: 113 / shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur // dbang @92a * //
translated: The wisdom and gnosis are also the mind and its appearances, in ten aspects.

original: ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa //
translated: The initiation is stainless, like the moon, a reflection in a mirror, and so forth.

original: de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste //
analyzed: de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste //
translated: From that, the bliss of nirvana, the unchanging innate bliss, is the fourth.

original: sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o /
translated: He who has this face of the Buddha in his heart and mouth is the glorious guru.

original: 114 / nam mkha' kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzums rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis //
analyzed: 114 / nam mkha' kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzums rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis //
translated: The mind and eye, which are attached to the whole of space, enter the path of the vajra, without winking.

original: stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang // 'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang // 'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: From the empty, smoke, mirage, clear and stainless light in the sky, a lamp, a flame, the moon, the sun, a vajra, the supreme part, and the drop are seen.

original: de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
analyzed: de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
translated: In the middle of that, the form of the Buddha, free from objects, is the sambhogakaya with many enjoyments.

original: 115 / nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste //
analyzed: 115 / nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste //
translated: The yogi should look with wide-open eyes at the sky free from clouds.

original: re kh'a nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba dus kyi rtsa la mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: re kh'a nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba dus kyi rtsa la mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o //
translated: Until the black line radiating stainless light is seen in the temporal artery.

original: de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni chu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te //
analyzed: de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni chu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te //
translated: The form of the Omniscient One is like the sun in water, unstained, with various colors,

original: rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang rnam par bral ba dag go sems ni gzhan pa min pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang rnam par bral ba dag go sems ni gzhan pa min pa nyid /
translated: endowed with all aspects, one's own mind free from objects, pure, and not another mind.

original: 116 / gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'gog par rab bya ste //
analyzed: 116 / gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'gog par rab bya ste //
translated: When form is seen, one should stop the life-force wind each day at the proper time.

original: 'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yongs su bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o //
analyzed: 'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yongs su bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o //
translated: When the form is seen, one should stop the life-breath until one sees the light-circle completely surrounding one‚Äôs body.

original: zla ba drug gi sdom brtson rnams kyi reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur //
analyzed: zla ba drug gi sdom brtson rnams kyi reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur //
translated: The yogi who is diligent for six months will have a path-mind of equal, inferior bliss by the tactile.

original: chags dang chags bral mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo /
analyzed: chags dang chags bral mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo /
translated: The number of breaths of the all-pervading lord increases in the final moment of attachment and non-attachment.

original: 117 / ao tt'a 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes rnam shes dag gi dbus //
analyzed: 117 / ao tt'a 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes rnam shes dag gi dbus //
translated: Between the blazing of O·∏ç·∏çiyƒÅna and special joy, between the innate and pristine awareness, between consciousness and pristine awareness,

original: gnyid dang gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje padma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang //
analyzed: gnyid dang gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje padma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang //
translated: the bliss of the union of the two vajras and two lotuses at the juncture of sleep and sleepiness,

original: de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med //
analyzed: de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med //
translated: its increase should be effected. There is no wonder in this increase by the power of the guru‚Äôs initiation.

original: nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o /
analyzed: nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o /
translated: Having conquered the demons of the afflictions, he enters the state of the lord of the victors, and is thus a good yogi by the process of years.

original: 118 / sa yis rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir //
analyzed: 118 / sa yis rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir //
translated: The earth is not a solid form, and water is not a liquid form, because it is not fluidity.

original: me yi rnam pa me min g-yo ba rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g-yo @92b ba min pas rlung ma yin //
analyzed: me yi rnam pa me min g-yo ba rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g-yo @92b ba min pas rlung ma yin //
translated: Fire is not a fiery form, and wind is not a moving form, because it does not move.

original: stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min //
analyzed: stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min //
translated: Space is not a visible form, and the colors white, green, and great variety of colors are not colors.

original: rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so /
translated: The all-aspect is not a visible form, because of the power of the afflictions, the demons, and the stains of one‚Äôs heart.

original: 119 / n'a da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas su son pa lu gu rgyud du bcings pa'i rtsa //
analyzed: 119 / n'a da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas su son pa lu gu rgyud du bcings pa'i rtsa //
translated: The nƒÅ·∏çƒ´, bindu, part, and the place of the am·πõta of gnosis are bound in a chain.

original: srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas pa padma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid //
analyzed: srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas pa padma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid //
translated: The three paths of the life-force and the evacuative wind are the vajra, the lotus, and the union of the vajra and lotus.

original: rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste //
analyzed: rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste //
translated: In the middle of the union of the two energies, the objects and the subjects arise and enter.

original: du ba la sogs rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya /
analyzed: du ba la sogs rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya /
translated: One should keep secret all of these signs of smoke and so forth.

original: 120 / dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g-yas dang g-yon la bcing //
analyzed: 120 / dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g-yas dang g-yon la bcing //
translated: Having placed the life-force in the central channel, one should bind the movement of the sun and moon to the right and left.

original: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang //
analyzed: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang //
translated: One should raise the vajra, abiding in the supreme bliss of the mind in union with the consort.

original: padmar rdo rje'i sgra'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor  ba bde ba'i slad du ste //
analyzed: padmar rdo rje'i sgra'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor  ba bde ba'i slad du ste //
translated: One should wave the vajra in the lotus, or wave one‚Äôs own lotus with the hand, for the sake of bliss.

original: sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal /
analyzed: sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal /
translated: That bliss, which is not the emission of the seed, is the face of the glorious guru, the snatcher of the fear of death.

original: 121 / sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o //
analyzed: 121 / sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o //
translated: The earth dissolves into water, and water into fire, which purifies into wind.

original: rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni //
analyzed: rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni //
translated: The wind is in the void, and the void is definitely the ten signs.

original: rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku //
translated: The signs are of all aspects, the imperishable, supreme, invincible bliss, the body of wisdom.

original: ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o /
analyzed: ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o /
translated: From wisdom, the magical power of spiritual attainment comes to the people, the lords of men, in this very life.

original: 122 /'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do //
analyzed: 122 /'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do //
translated: The desire is definitely the emanation body, and the perfection is its speech.

original: 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni ao tt'a nyid //
analyzed: 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni ao tt'a nyid //
translated: The blazing is the emanation mind, and its supreme bliss is the wisdom of O·∏ç·∏çiyƒÅna.

original: dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas 'di yi ni //
analyzed: dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas 'di yi ni //
translated: Joy is the body of perfect enjoyment, and with supreme joy, the special joy is its speech and mind.

original: gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur /
analyzed: gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur /
translated: The innate joy is also the source of bliss, and its wisdom is the vajra.

original: 123 /'dar ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur //
analyzed: 123 /'dar ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur //
translated: The trembling is the Dharma Body, bowed to by the three worlds, and is his speech, which is the element.

original: gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o //
analyzed: gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o //
translated: The falling asleep is the Dharma Mind, and the sleep is the knowledge which destroys the fear of the world.

original: yi ge nyid ni dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs @93a * //
analyzed: yi ge nyid ni dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs @93a * //
translated: The letter is the pure body, and the vowel

original: dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le n'a da rim pa yis //
analyzed: dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le n'a da rim pa yis //
translated: is the part without sound, and the drop is the stage.

original: bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o /
analyzed: bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o /
translated: The speech, mind, and knowledge vajras of the pure body, the source of bliss, abide in the world.

original: 124 / sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: 124 / sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: The waking state, the dream state, and the other, the nature of deep sleep, and the fourth,

original: lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par dpyod cing g-yo med sems la zhen pa ste //
analyzed: lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par dpyod cing g-yo med sems la zhen pa ste //
translated: are the nature of the body, the nature of the breath, the nature of the objects, the nature of the mind,üîΩand the nature of the knowledge, respectively.

original: ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur //
analyzed: ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur //
translated: The bodhicitta melts in an instant from the union with the woman who abides in the knowledge.

original: sprul pa la sogs dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur /
analyzed: sprul pa la sogs dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur /
translated: The four vajras of the mind, such as the emanation vajra, are definitely the four aspects of the mind.

original: 125 / de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su ste //
analyzed: 125 / de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su ste //
translated: Thus, the four aspects of the mind are in the center of the bindu of all living beings who abide in the three existences.

original: rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyi bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyi bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar bya //
translated: The yogis and yoginis should protect the all-pervading bindu, which bestows the result of the bliss of equality, for the sake of liberation.
