analyzed: thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa gang //
translated: If the bindu is released, the seed of birth of the yogis and yoginis is lost, and liberation is lost.

original: de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya /
analyzed: de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya /
translated: Therefore, the practitioners of yoga should abandon all the moments of samsaric bliss.

original: 126 / gang phyir aa sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdan min zhing //
analyzed: 126 / gang phyir aa sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdan min zhing //
translated: Because the moon and sun are not the seat of the vajra possessor, the single one, such as the a and so on, the ka and so on,

original: h'um yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod de //
analyzed: h'um yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod de //
translated: the sign and the complete transformation are not asserted to be different colors and forms by the syllable h≈´·πÉ.

original: 'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni //
analyzed: 'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni //
translated: The supreme organ, which is generated by the unchanging, pure, and is free from change,

original: rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o /
analyzed: rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o /
translated: is the holder of the illusion of the diversity of the Lord of Victors, the bindu endowed with all aspects.

original: 127 / li sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du 'gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams //
analyzed: 127 / li sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du 'gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams //
translated: The eight vowels such as ‚Äúi‚Äù and so on, which are the qualities of the object, are divided by the half-vowel.

original: phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste //
analyzed: phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste //
translated: The tastes and the arrows, divided by the mutual separation, are the vƒÅyu of the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´.

original: dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams //
analyzed: dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams //
translated: In the second conjunction, the long ones are divided by the mutual separation due to the qualities of the object.

original: slar yang thun mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab /
analyzed: slar yang thun mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab /
translated: Again, in the third period, the very long ones are the vƒÅyu of the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ due to the qualities of the object.

original: 128 / de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo ro rnams dbu ma yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs //
analyzed: 128 / de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo ro rnams dbu ma yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs //
translated: In that way, the mountains of the tastes with the arrows are the vƒÅyu of the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ in the four periods.

original: ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya @93b nyid ;
analyzed: ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya @93b nyid ;
translated: The thirty vowels and consonants are distinguished thirty times each, making nine hundred.

original: / dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
analyzed: / dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
translated: The three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the three conjunctions are the sky, the sky, and the arrow.

original: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phyi rnams phyi ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la /
analyzed: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phyi rnams phyi ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la /
translated: The three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the three conjunctions are the three outer days, distinguished by the long one.

original: 129 / slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
analyzed: 129 / slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
translated: The three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the three conjunctions are the three nights, distinguished by the six vowels.

original: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
analyzed: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
translated: The three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the three conjunctions are the three outer nights, distinguished by the long one.

original: nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab //
analyzed: nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab //
translated: The vƒÅyu moves in the six spaces, the moon, and the eyes during the day and night.

original: snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya /
analyzed: snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya /
translated: The empty ones are combined in the forward and reverse order and applied to the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´.

original: 130 / phyi rol du ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas //
analyzed: 130 / phyi rol du ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas //
translated: When Rahu is in the other half of the eighth part of the day outside,

original: de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste //
analyzed: de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste //
translated: then in his own body, in the half of the breath, the world is free from darkness and is illuminated.

original: snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o //
translated: The first half is with darkness, and the entire triple world dissolves into emptiness.üîΩTherefore, the yogi who is endowed with the KƒÅlacakra enters into the cave, alone, free from darkness.

original: de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug 131 / zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi la ste //
analyzed: de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug 131 / zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi la ste //
translated: The part of the supreme lord that is less than the moon and more than the sun is here in the four periods.

original: thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis //
analyzed: thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis //
translated: In each period, by the power of day and night, the movement is divided into half-periods.

original: sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la //
translated: The thirty-six messengers of time, the other lords of men, are divided into the eight and the two fortnights.

original: gza' rnams kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma tshigs kyi tshogs la'o /
analyzed: gza' rnams kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma tshigs kyi tshogs la'o /
translated: The eight divisions of the planets, and again the many other groups of joints.

original: 132 / rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsum skyed par mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs //
analyzed: 132 / rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsum skyed par mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs //
translated: The dakini who generates the three worlds, the remainder of the breath of the time of the Vedas, is the form of the sky.

original: zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur //
analyzed: zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur //
translated: That which is inferior in the middle of the moon is the two kinds of mudras of the supreme lord of victors.

original: gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbye phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab mang  thun tshod longs spyod mtha' //
analyzed: gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbye phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab mang  thun tshod longs spyod mtha' //
translated: That which abides in the sun is the eight divisions, the directions and the intermediate directions, the many petals, the end of the enjoyment of the periods.

original: lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o /
analyzed: lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o /
translated: The remainder of the supreme dakinis of the wheel, all the others, are in the outer and the body.

original: 133 / spen par bug pa mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha yi bla ma'i phyed bcas @94a * //
analyzed: 133 / spen par bug pa mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha yi bla ma'i phyed bcas @94a * //
translated: In Saturn, the hole is called ‚Äúdarkness,‚Äù the day is called ‚Äúdivine,‚Äù half of the guru,

original: mig dang mig gi grangs //
analyzed: mig dang mig gi grangs //
translated: the eyes, and the number of the eyes.

original: phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes //
analyzed: phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes //
translated: The six and a half [signs] are the Vedas, born from the mind vajra of the supreme lord of victors.

original: sa skyes stong pa sprul zla nyi ma gza' lhag pa sangs mjug rings la yang stong pa sprul mkha' gcig / mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las byung /
analyzed: sa skyes stong pa sprul zla nyi ma gza' lhag pa sangs mjug rings la yang stong pa sprul mkha' gcig / mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las byung /
translated: The earth, the empty, the emanation, the moon, the sun, and the planet Jupiter, born from the pure speech of the supreme lord, are one with the empty, the emanation, the space, and the eye.

original: 134 / gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung //
analyzed: 134 / gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung //
translated: The enjoyments of the moon, the space, the space, the taste, and the fire, born from the body vajra, are one with the empty, the emanation, the space, and the eye.

original: mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sprul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshod de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sprul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshod de bzhin nyid //
translated: The six tastes, the emanation, and the times, all in one, are the half-hour periods.

original: mkha' 'gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma //
translated: The dakinis, the forms of time, reside in the body and steal the life of living beings.

original: de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag par byas nas de rnams bsgrub par bya /
analyzed: de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag par byas nas de rnams bsgrub par bya /
translated: Therefore, at each time of the day, having blocked one's own path, one should accomplish them.

original: 135 / ji srid gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las //
analyzed: 135 / ji srid gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las //
translated: As long as the planets are in their own or in another‚Äôs house, in inhalation or exhalation,

original: de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci //
analyzed: de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci //
translated: will the messengers of time, the all-pervading ones, grant the supreme in the three worlds?

original: pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur med la //
analyzed: pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur med la //
translated: The messengers, subtle and moving, abiding in the guru‚Äôs speech, with the bodhicitta and unchanging,

original: sdig bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyi ma yin no /
analyzed: sdig bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyi ma yin no /
translated: are to be known by the yogis free of sin, not otherwise by the mind of desire.

original: 136 / nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sred pas bsnun pa rnams //
analyzed: 136 / nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sred pas bsnun pa rnams //
translated: The feet of the sun and moon, by the power of the movement of both, are struck by craving,

original: yan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang mjug rings za //
analyzed: yan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang mjug rings za //
translated: and divided by the limbs. The remaining foot is the tail of RƒÅhu.

original: thun mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams //
analyzed: thun mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams //
translated: In all the periods, in the eight periods, in the time of each day, the twelve limbs of living beings

original: dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab par yan lag gsungs /
analyzed: dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab par yan lag gsungs /
translated: In each conjunction, the breaths are doubled, and the life-winds flow in nine hundred.

original: 137 / yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par //
analyzed: 137 / yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par //
translated: The first day of the two-by-two limbs is the first limb, ignorance.

original: de phyir dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar gzhan gang yin de rnams so //
analyzed: de phyir dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar gzhan gang yin de rnams so //
translated: Therefore, the limbs are by time, etc. The other nine are the same as before.

original: de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis gnyis dag las 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis gnyis dag las 'gyur //
translated: Thus, in two months, by the five aspects, the time is complete.

original: gang @94b du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o /
analyzed: gang @94b du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o /
translated: The first month is the one in which one part of the moon is lost.

original: 138 / zla ba drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel pa yan lag bcu gnyis kyis //
analyzed: 138 / zla ba drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel pa yan lag bcu gnyis kyis //
translated: In six months and three times, there is conception by the twelve members of dependent origination.

original: drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang pa'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs //
analyzed: drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang pa'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs //
translated: The sixth is the solar division, which enters the center of the moon by the power of the movement of the feet.

original: reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gi rkang pa de 'dzin no //
analyzed: reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gi rkang pa de 'dzin no //
translated: In the middle of the limb of contact, Rahu seizes the foot of the moon and sun.

original: nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag grub pa ster /
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag grub pa ster /
translated: The herbs looked at by Rahu during the day and night give success.

original: 139 / sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes spen //
analyzed: 139 / sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes spen //
translated: The herbs born on the earth, Mercury, the moon, the sun, Mercury, Jupiter, the earth, the mantra born of the sun, Saturn,

original: sngags pa lug la sogs pa'i khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can rnams te dus kun tu //
analyzed: sngags pa lug la sogs pa'i khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can rnams te dus kun tu //
translated: the herbs in the houses of Aries and so forth, on each day, always.

original: zhi la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang gsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o /
analyzed: zhi la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang gsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o /
translated: For peace, the house of the moon and sun; for increase, Mercury, Jupiter, the earth, the mantra born of the sun; for subjugation, attraction, separation, and killing, if the herbs are in these houses, they are excellent.

original: 140 / zhi la dkar po'i zhal te dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang ser mtshungs thun tshod lag pa las //
analyzed: 140 / zhi la dkar po'i zhal te dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang ser mtshungs thun tshod lag pa las //
translated: For peace, a white face; for increase, white and yellow, in the first watch; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red; for killing, black; for attraction, red and white; for pacification, white; for increase, yellow; for subjugation, red

original: rengs pa ser po me yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mtshungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la //üîΩdmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o //
analyzed: rengs pa ser po me yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mtshungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la // dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o //
translated: For paralysis, yellow, for the third part of the night; for stupefaction, gold-like the sun, for the fourth part of the night; for attraction, red, for the fifth part of the night; for subjugation, sun-like the ocean, for the sixth part of the night.üîΩFor killing, a black face, for the mountain; for banishing, black and white, for the end of night; for deluding, for the end of night; for summoning, for the end of night; for enthralling, for the end of night; for paralyzing, yellow, for the third part of the night; for stupefaction, gold-like the sun, for the fourth part of the night; for attraction, red, for the fifth part of the night; for subjugation, sun-like the ocean, for the sixth part of the night.

original: gsad la nag po'i zhal te ri bo la'o bskrad la gnag dang dkar 'dir sprul la mtshan mo'i mthar /
analyzed: gsad la nag po'i zhal te ri bo la'o bskrad la gnag dang dkar 'dir sprul la mtshan mo'i mthar /
translated: For killing, a black face, for the mountain; for banishing, black and white, for the end of night; for deluding, for the end of night; for summoning, for the end of night; for enthralling, for the end of night; for paralyzing, yellow, for the third part of the night; for stupefaction, gold-like the sun, for the fourth part of the night; for attraction, red, for the fifth part of the night; for subjugation, sun-like the ocean, for the sixth part of the night.

original: 141 / sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod byed po min //
analyzed: 141 / sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod byed po min //
translated: Earth, water, fire, wind, the moon, the sun, the gods‚Äîthese are not the life-force, nor are they the enjoyer.

original: 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni longs spyod sems par byed //
analyzed: 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni longs spyod sems par byed //
translated: These are not the life-force, nor are they the enjoyer. By the power of the result of non-virtue, I think of enjoyment.

original: sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed //
analyzed: sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed //
translated: The assembly of craving, suffering, and subsequent attachment, the hosts of spirits, the planets and stars, strive for the sake of the gods.

original: gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no /
analyzed: gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no /
translated: By whose kindness one would become liberated, that peace is not made by the mind.

original: 142 / dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gis de yang gsum grangs 'gyur //
analyzed: 142 / dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gis de yang gsum grangs 'gyur //
translated: The first breath, which is of the nature of the three qualities, becomes three due to the power of the qualities.

original: de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis chos zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang su ma 'gyur ni //üîΩ'byung ba chu gter grangs @95a * //
analyzed: de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis chos zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang su ma 'gyur ni // 'byung ba chu gter grangs @95a * //
translated: That also becomes the so-called dharas due to the power of the qualities of the object.üîΩThose again, by the number of the oceans,

original: 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ba'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams //
analyzed: 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ba'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams //
translated: are struck by the divisions of the movements from that.üîΩThe number of breaths in half a prahara is the number of breaths in a prahara.üîΩThe number of breaths in two praharas is the number of breaths in three praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in three praharas is the number of breaths in four praharas.

original: chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs rnams so /
analyzed: chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs rnams so /
translated: The number of breaths in four praharas is the number of breaths in five praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in five praharas is the number of breaths in six praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in six praharas is the number of breaths in seven praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in seven praharas is the number of breaths in eight praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in eight praharas is the number of breaths in nine praharas.

original: 143 / gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste //üîΩde nas sde yi rab dbye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum //
analyzed: 143 / gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste //üîΩde nas sde yi rab dbye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum //
translated: The number of breaths in nine praharas is the number of breaths in ten praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in ten praharas is the number of breaths in eleven praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in eleven praharas is the number of breaths in twelve praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in twelve praharas is the number of breaths in thirteen praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in thirteen praharas is the number of breaths in fourteen praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in fourteen praharas is the number of breaths in fifteen praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in fifteen praharas is the number of breaths in sixteen praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in sixteen praharas is the number of breaths in seventeen praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in seventeen praharas is the number of breaths in eighteen praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in eighteen praharas is the number of breaths in nineteen praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in nineteen praharas is the number of breaths in twenty praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in twenty praharas is the number of breaths in twenty-one praharas.üîΩThe number of breaths in twenty-one praharas is the number of breaths in twenty-two pra

original: kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las //
analyzed: kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las //
translated: The moon and sun, which grant the fruit of the bliss of equality, are filled with the nectar of the moon and sun.

original: ji srid rig byed sprul dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can du rab tu 'gyur /
analyzed: ji srid rig byed sprul dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can du rab tu 'gyur /
translated: The Vedas, the serpent, and fire are the sword, skull, and human bone of the one who holds the sword and skull.

original: 144 /'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis //
analyzed: 144 /'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis //
translated: The wheel, arrow, and ocean are the body, speech, and mind of the one who is distinguished by the number of the country and the quality of the country.

original: gtso bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so //
analyzed: gtso bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so //
translated: The chief one, who grants the fruit of the bliss of equality, is the eight goddesses beginning with DhumƒÅ.

original: de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs //
analyzed: de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs //
translated: Thus, the chief one, who resides in the sun, is embraced by the supreme portion of the moon, the one of various forms.

original: lha mo sangs rgyas mchi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os pa'o /
analyzed: lha mo sangs rgyas mchi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os pa'o /
translated: The goddesses, the buddhas, and the tears are the RƒÅhu, moon, and sun, which are worthy of homage.

original: 145 / gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang //
analyzed: 145 / gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang //
translated: The object of the supreme quality of the subtle nature of the chief one is the inner and outer mudrƒÅ.

original: de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
translated: Those are the dakinis who are born from the mind of the wrathful, most terrifying one in the three realms.

original: gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
analyzed: gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
translated: The principal lords, the three, abiding in existence, are the vajras of body, speech, and mind.

original: de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shis la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnams so /
analyzed: de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shis la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnams so /
translated: Those, together with their objects, are embraced by the qualities, and these are the dakinis of the vajra, such as auspiciousness, and so on.

original: 146 / gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni //
analyzed: 146 / gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni //
translated: Form, sound, taste, smell, and the others, then touch, smoke, dust, and so on,

original: snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra gcan gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste //
analyzed: snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra gcan gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste //
translated: are embraced by the moon in the mind, in sequence, and likewise, by Rahu,

original: de dag rnams kyi dal rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi dal rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di //
translated: and their movement in the six channels, such as the swift and crooked, and so on, is the many paths of this [mandala].

original: brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pa 'khor lo'i tshul /
analyzed: brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pa 'khor lo'i tshul /
translated: The eight, in the six channels, are the eight objects and qualities, abiding in the manner of a wheel.

original: 147 / dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad de yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa //
analyzed: 147 / dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad de yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa //
translated: The first breath is divided into eight parts, and it is located in the object, the qualities, and all around, in smoke, and so forth.

original: mkha' 'gro @95b ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyam ste 'gro ba drug tu gnas //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro @95b ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyam ste 'gro ba drug tu gnas //
translated: Surrounded by the dakinis, it wanders by the power of the three movements, and it is located in the six migrations.

original: de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku //
analyzed: de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku //
translated: In the middle of that, the KƒÅlacakra is embraced by the part of the emission of nectar, the pure body.

original: gang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus kyi 'khor lo'o /
analyzed: gang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus kyi 'khor lo'o /
translated: That very thing, which is the entry into the body of the Victor by means of the suspension of breath, is the KƒÅlacakra.

original: 148 / dbugs ni bcad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: 148 / dbugs ni bcad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te //
translated: At the end of the suspension of breath, there is no movement of the three kinds, nor is there any of the six kinds.

original: thig le bkab par gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: thig le bkab par gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: When the drop is covered, the supreme lord of all, infinite bliss, enters at the time.

original: 'khor ba dag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
analyzed: 'khor ba dag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
translated: Having abandoned the bliss of cyclic existence, the yogƒ´ should meditate on the face of the supreme guru.

original: spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa ma yin no /
analyzed: spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa ma yin no /
translated: The yoginƒ´s are not pleased with the form of the conduct of the hero, which is most frightening.

original: 149 / gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim 'gyur te //
analyzed: 149 / gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim 'gyur te //
translated: The entire host of planets dissolves into the breath of the principal one by the process of time.

original: dbugs ni mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter song na thams cad stong par skul bar byed //
analyzed: dbugs ni mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter song na thams cad stong par skul bar byed //
translated: The breath goes into space, space, the sky, the eye, fire, and the ocean, and all are aroused to emptiness.

original: lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol du ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la //
analyzed: lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol du ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la //
translated: By these years, externally, the supreme lord is the form of the expansion and withdrawal of the feet.

original: rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi dbus su 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya /
analyzed: rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi dbus su 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya /
translated: One should know that by their own measure, the feet of the lord of victors go and remain in the middle of the breath.

original: 150 / stong pa la ni spen pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te //
analyzed: 150 / stong pa la ni spen pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te //
translated: On the empty, Saturn enters by the force of its own motion, and at the end of time,

original: stong pa nam mkha' mtsho chu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lhag ma rnams kyis nam gru'o //
analyzed: stong pa nam mkha' mtsho chu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lhag ma rnams kyis nam gru'o //
translated: the empty, the sky, the ocean, the moon, the day, and the remaining enjoyments are the nak·π£atras.

original: rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mtsho mig gis der ni sgra gcan 'jug / rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' dus dus kyi lha yi blon po 'jug 151 / nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha'üîΩbrgyad sprul dang mig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis 'jug pa ste //
analyzed: rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mtsho mig gis der ni sgra gcan 'jug / rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' dus dus kyi lha yi blon po 'jug 151 / nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad sprul dang mig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis 'jug pa ste //
translated: The sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, and the sky of the sky, on the days of one‚Äôs own movement.üîΩThe sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, and the sky of the sky, on the days of one‚Äôs own movement.üîΩThe sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, and the sky of the sky, on the days of one‚Äôs own movement.üîΩThe sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, and the sky of the sky, on the days of one‚Äôs own movement.üîΩThe sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, and the sky of the sky, on the days of one‚Äôs own movement.

original: mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug / mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba der @96a * //üîΩ'jug ste // de yi dus su rgyal po'i 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur /
analyzed: mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug / mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba der @96a * //üîΩ'jug ste // de yi dus su rgyal po'i 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur /
translated: The sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky, the sky of the sky,

original: 152 / de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun tu spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 152 / de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun tu spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur //
translated: Then, the conduct of the channels in the rising sun and moon changes.

original: gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mda' dang ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsa //
analyzed: gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mda' dang ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsa //
translated: One, two, three, ocean, arrow, corpse, mountain, and wealth increase in the secret channel.

original: bug pa zhes bya sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo'i rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o //
analyzed: bug pa zhes bya sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo'i rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o //
translated: The tenth, the subtle channel, is called the ‚Äúopening‚Äù or ‚Äúdoor‚Äù channel, and is again on the upper path.

original: de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams dag tu 'gyur /
analyzed: de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams dag tu 'gyur /
translated: It is divided into armies, with qualities and objects, in the channels of the cakras.

original: 153 / gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin pa'i phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang // lte bar 'khor lo'i rtsa ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams //
analyzed: 153 / gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin pa'i phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang // lte bar 'khor lo'i rtsa ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams //
translated: The moon is in the head, throat, and heart regions, and the sun moves in the navel. The channel cakras are in the navel, with the thirty-two gods of the zodiac and their doubles.

original: zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyi rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dad //
analyzed: zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyi rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dad //
translated: The lunar digits are not differentiated, and all are mixed with the solar digits.

original: brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams /
analyzed: brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams /
translated: The channels of the hands and feet are divided into two groups of eighty-one each.

original: 154 / gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams //
analyzed: 154 / gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams //
translated: The crown and heart are the moon and sun, and the remaining ones are in the throat cakra.

original: brgyad cu rtsa gcig mtha' ma rab gsal rnam bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te //
analyzed: brgyad cu rtsa gcig mtha' ma rab gsal rnam bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te //
translated: The last of the eighty-one, the ten bright ones, are the peaceful and wrathful planets.

original: de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing //
translated: The first and last parts of those are enjoyed by the channel of time, which is located at the feet of the lord.

original: gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi skyed ma rdo rje sku yi mkha' 'gro ma yis longs spyod do /
analyzed: gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi skyed ma rdo rje sku yi mkha' 'gro ma yis longs spyod do /
translated: The end of the planets is enjoyed by the sky-wanderer of the vajra body, the mother of the three worlds.

original: 155 / dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 155 / dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur //
translated: First, the nature of emptiness is located in the object and the qualities, and it becomes their nature.

original: khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste //
analyzed: khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste //
translated: It enters the elements and the aggregates, and again it is equal in the sense faculties such as the eyes.

original: sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab zhugs pa //
analyzed: sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab zhugs pa //
translated: In the waking state, in dreams, and so on, one has entered into the supreme bliss of union, which is indestructible.üîΩ

original: rig ma sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yi ni tshigs la gnas pa rnal 'byor ba yis btsal bar bya /
analyzed: rig ma sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yi ni tshigs la gnas pa rnal 'byor ba yis btsal bar bya /
translated: The yogi should search for the vajra line, the mother of the buddhas, the consort, who is fully and perfectly engaged in the supreme bliss that is undefeatable in the waking, dream, and other states.

original: 156 / gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi mchog gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur //
analyzed: 156 / gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi mchog gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur //
translated: By the power of the principal‚Äôs body, the yogi‚Äôs supreme body becomes the divine eye.

original: de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa @96b shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa @96b shes par 'gyur //
translated: By the power of his speech, the ear; and by the power of his mind, the knowledge of the mind of another.

original: shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par 'gyur //
translated: By the power of the body of wisdom, the recollection of past lives in the three existences.

original: shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur /
translated: By the power of the speech of wisdom, the magical power of omnipresence in all times and places.

original: 157 / shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med par 'gyur //
analyzed: 157 / shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med par 'gyur //
translated: By the power of the wisdom of wisdom, the bliss of all times is undefeatable.

original: lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong ba dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong ba dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: By the power of the divine eye, one sees what is not seen by the eye and the three realms of existence.

original: lha yi rna ba dag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos par 'gyur //
analyzed: lha yi rna ba dag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos par 'gyur //
translated: By the power of the divine ear, one hears the sounds of the voice and mouth of beings.

original: de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams cad 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams cad 'gyur /
translated: Likewise, O King, by the union of body, speech, and mind, one experiences all tactile sensations and so forth.

original: 158 / rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshang ba khu ba 'bab pa rnams //
analyzed: 158 / rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshang ba khu ba 'bab pa rnams //
translated: The channel that is the downward-clearing wind is in the middle, with three paths, flowing with urine, feces, and semen.

original: srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te mtha' ma sangs rgyas zhal //
analyzed: srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te mtha' ma sangs rgyas zhal //
translated: The life-force moves through them in nine ways, ending at the face of the Buddha.

original: rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyis shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas pa dang // thig le gtsug tor bug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes pa min pa rnams la rgya yis btab pa gang /
analyzed: rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyis shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas pa dang // thig le gtsug tor bug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes pa min pa rnams la rgya yis btab pa gang /
translated: The two ears, nose, and eyes are known as the two, and the uvula together with the tongue and the bindu at the crown aperture are the ten, sealed by the unknown.

original: 159 / srog dang thur sel 'gags par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa nyi ma'i gzugs su rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 159 / srog dang thur sel 'gags par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa nyi ma'i gzugs su rab tu 'gyur //
translated: When the life-force and downward-voiding [vƒÅyus] cease, the rabbit-holder moves, becoming the form of the sun.

original: rdo rje padmas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed //
analyzed: rdo rje padmas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed //
translated: When the vajra and lotus are awakened, it is again burned by the flames of the form of the sun.

original: rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes gcig tu 'gyur //
analyzed: rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes gcig tu 'gyur //
translated: When the vƒÅyus of the moon and sun cease, consciousness and gnosis become one.

original: de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin /
analyzed: de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin /
translated: In that way, in that way, in that way, there are three; there is no other.

original: 160 / zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang min pa nyid //
analyzed: 160 / zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang min pa nyid //
translated: When the forms of the moon and sun are consumed, there is never day or night in the sky.

original: thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbus su rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbus su rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o //
translated: That juncture is the state of am·πõta for yogins and yoginƒ´s at all times in the center of the body.

original: phyogs zad zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar //
analyzed: phyogs zad zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar //
translated: Just as the form of the moon in the sky is the same taste in the form of the sun,

original: srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gag go /
analyzed: srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gag go /
translated: When the life and downward-voiding [vƒÅyus] are exhausted, the body becomes clear, and at the time of attainment, they cease.

original: 161 / zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po @97a * //
analyzed: 161 / zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po @97a * //
translated: The movement of the sun and moon is lost, and the path of both is the great life-force vƒÅyu.

original: 'gag / chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs //
analyzed: 'gag / chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs //
translated: The water-born vajra is activated, and the rabbit enters the great form of the sun.

original: dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid pa la gnas gzhom med legs par rab tu rtogs gyur pa //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid pa la gnas gzhom med legs par rab tu rtogs gyur pa //
translated: The one taste of existence and nonexistence is the third, the excellent realization of the indestructible drop.

original: de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro /
analyzed: de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro /
translated: At that time, the yogi/nƒ´ goes to the supreme stage, where there is not even a little bit of duality.

original: 162 / khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs //
analyzed: 162 / khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs //
translated: The wrathful ones, the buddhas, and the goddesses, definitely the heroes, Ak·π£hobhya, and so on,

original: rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur //
translated: the minds of the supremely joyful ones, manifest in the sky at the time of the yogi/nƒ´‚Äôs attainment.

original: de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur //
translated: The desired powers of that [moon] are at dawn and midnight of the rabbit-holder's day.

original: rin po che'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyis sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur /
analyzed: rin po che'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyis sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur /
translated: A rain of flowers or jewels, supreme in time, falls on the earth by the conjunction.

original: 163 / lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur //
analyzed: 163 / lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur //
translated: The body is pure, the dust gone, like space, and the signs, etc. are completely perfected.

original: sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang //
translated: The various three worlds are pure, free from obscurations, appearing like a dream.

original: skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste //
analyzed: skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste //
translated: Speech is uninterrupted, and with many other languages it enters the heart of others.

original: sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang zhig mi g-yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o /
analyzed: sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang zhig mi g-yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o /
translated: The mind is filled with the bliss of the holy, unmoving, embraced by the innate at all times.

original: 164 / sa las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi rdul phran phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed //
analyzed: 164 / sa las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi rdul phran phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed //
translated: Having dissolved the elements of earth, water, Meru, and wind into the water element,

original: chu las sa me rlung phye rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste //
analyzed: chu las sa me rlung phye rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste //
translated: Earth, water, and wind are differentiated from the wind.üîΩFrom the wind, earth, water, and the peak of existence are differentiated.

original: rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la //
analyzed: rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la //
translated: The wind of karma is also empty.

analyzed: slar yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la chung ngu'i dngos rnams so /

analyzed: 167 / dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thams cad dag gis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed //

analyzed: gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa yis ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid //

analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo dag la'o /

original: 173 / phyed bcas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: 173 / phyed bcas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste //

analyzed: thugs kyi phyed ni sor drug rkang pa dang bcas snying ga la gnas lhan skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o //

analyzed: gsum po dag las sgo rnams bya ste nor bu'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor rnams las brgyad cha'o //

analyzed: 'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo nyis 'gyur dag tu 'gyur /

original: 174 / lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 174 / lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur //

analyzed: de bzhin lha yi ri bo dag ni lus kyi tshad du 'gyur te rgyar ni phyed kyi tshad yin no //
translated: In the same way, the celestial mountains become the measure of the body, and the breadth is half that.

analyzed: de yi steng du rdo rje rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de yi yang ni phyed du 'gyur //

analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo sku yi 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu'i gnas nas steng du mdzod spu phyed kyi mtshams //

analyzed: sgo khyud mthar ni dpal ldan 'gram par 'gyur te mi bdag dpral ba'i @98b steng du gtsug tor dag gi mtshams //
translated: At the end of the door lintel, there is the glorious cheek, and above the forehead of the Lord of humans, the point of the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a.

original: phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o /
analyzed: phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o /
translated: The sun and half [a half] are the mandalas of earth, water, fire, and wind, together with the tongues of flame, the vajra fence.

original: 176 / steng dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku 'di mnyam par 'gyur te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 176 / steng dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku 'di mnyam par 'gyur te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The body of the Buddha is equal above and below, the wheel of body, speech, and mind.

original: kun nas rlung gis bgrod pa'i dbang gis thad ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis //
analyzed: kun nas rlung gis bgrod pa'i dbang gis thad ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis //
translated: By the power of the wind moving all around, the three [are] by the measure of the straight [line], or likewise, the six [are] by the measure of the diagonal.

analyzed: rtsibs brgyad mtshan ma dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis 'khor lor 'gyur //

analyzed: sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dur khrod brtag par bya /
translated: The glorious charnel grounds are to be examined by the eight gates and one's own palm and nails.

original: 177 / steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis dang chu gter tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 177 / steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis dang chu gter tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The mandala of the Bhagavatƒ´ is by the faces above and below, the two in the secret place, and the measure of the ocean.

original: padma phyed la snying po'i dbus nas gsum rnams kyis kyang de nas phreng ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug / sgo la sogs pa dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag gis nges par rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: padma phyed la snying po'i dbus nas gsum rnams kyis kyang de nas phreng ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug / sgo la sogs pa dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag gis nges par rab tu 'gyur //
translated: In the center of the heart of the half lotus, the three [channels] are also [present]. From there, the six wheels with their garlands, the doors, etc., and the cheeks are definitely formed by five parts of the wheel.

analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni mchod rten gzugs 'di kun nas shes rab ma yin thabs kyang ma yin no /

analyzed: 178 / lhun po'i phyi rol du ni 'og gi sa gzhi'i gnas la dngos grub brgyad po yang dag gnas pa ste ;

analyzed: / shar du ral grir 'gyur te ro yi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ril bu mig sman ro tsa na //

analyzed: lho ru dpal ldan rkang mgyogs mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zur du'o //

analyzed: dbus su mchod phyir thogs pa dag ste lha dang mi yi bla ma'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do /
translated: In the center is the sacred thread, and the divine, human, and sublime BrahmƒÅ voices are just that.

analyzed: 179 / nor bu gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni //

analyzed: gcig gnyis chu gter mda' dang klu yi dbang po dgu bcas nyin byed sor rnams dag gis rim pas so //

analyzed: dbus dang steng 'og gsum gyi cha ste zum pa dang ni rnam par gyes pa zhi dang drag po la //
translated: The middle, upper, and lower parts, the closed and open parts, are peaceful and wrathful.

analyzed: dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng ni rdo rje dang mtshungs ba lang kha dang padma'i gzugs /

analyzed: 180 / khyon ni de yi sum cha zhal dang bcas pa'i lte ba 'dab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las //

analyzed: rva ni khyon dang mtshungs pa phyogs dang phyogs bral du @99a * //

analyzed: ste rva yi zlum po dag ni bzhi cha'o //

original: phyi rol rva yi sum cha 'og ste steng du ba da r'i yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol rva yi sum cha 'og ste steng du ba da r'i yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o //

analyzed: dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin 'dab ma rdo rje yang ngo ba lang kha la sogs pa de bzhin nyid /

original: 181 / gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod spu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad //
analyzed: 181 / gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod spu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad //
translated: The supreme Victorious One‚Äôs st≈´pa is the measure of the height of the tip of the secret lotus.

original: de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi rgya ste sa bzhin shin tu nyams pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams //üîΩphyed dang gnyis mthar phyir byung chu skyes snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o //
analyzed: de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi rgya ste sa bzhin shin tu nyams pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams // phyed dang gnyis mthar phyir byung chu skyes snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o //
translated: Half of that is the width of the seat, and like the earth, it is very low. One-third of that is the sides.üîΩHalf of that is the height of the lotus, which emerges from the middle of the navel. The mandala that reaches the heart is round, the measure of the seat.

original: padma'i mtha' las cha dman gzhi dang mnyam pa brang ste de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o /
analyzed: padma'i mtha' las cha dman gzhi dang mnyam pa brang ste de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o /
translated: The base is equal to the tip of the lotus. The chest is one-third of that. The throat is one-third of that.

original: 182 / gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu ma nyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams //
analyzed: 182 / gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu ma nyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams //
translated: The face is half of the seat. Like the earth, it is very low. One-third of that is the sides.

original: gsang ba'i chu skyes dag las phyed bcas nyi mas dpangs su shin tu mnyam pa'i gdan gyi tshad 'gyur te //
analyzed: gsang ba'i chu skyes dag las phyed bcas nyi mas dpangs su shin tu mnyam pa'i gdan gyi tshad 'gyur te //
translated: The distance from the secret lotus to the navel is the same as the height of the seat, which is one-half of a finger-width.

original: gdan nas padma'i mngon mtshams snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: gdan nas padma'i mngon mtshams snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o //
translated: From the seat to the tip of the lotus, to the heart, to the end of the circle, and then to the base of the throat.

original: de nas gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin chu gter dus dang phyed bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum /
analyzed: de nas gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin chu gter dus dang phyed bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum /
translated: Then, to the end of the face, the ocean, the time, and one-half, with the Vedas, the three sections.

original: 183 / gdan las rig byed dag gis padma snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te //
analyzed: 183 / gdan las rig byed dag gis padma snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te //
translated: From the seat, with the Vedas, to the lotus, to the heart, to the end of the circle, to the throat, the same.

original: phyed bcas brgyad kyis gdong pa'i tshad dang de yi steng du gdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi dbang //
analyzed: phyed bcas brgyad kyis gdong pa'i tshad dang de yi steng du gdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi dbang //
translated: With one-half plus eight, the measure of the face. Above that, the garland of parasols, O Lord of Men.

original: mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral bdag dang mgo bo de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di //
analyzed: mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral bdag dang mgo bo de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di //
translated: From the point between the eyebrows to the forehead, to the head, and then to the end of the ushnisha here.

original: de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku ste 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no /
analyzed: de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku ste 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no /
translated: Thus, the entire world is the body of the Victorious One, the nature of the wheel of st≈´pas.

original: 184 / gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul ni chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams yin no //
analyzed: 184 / gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul ni chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams yin no //
translated: Gold is the element of earth, silver is the element of water, and copper is the element of fire.

original: lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni stong pa dag dang 'dres pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no ;
analyzed: lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni stong pa dag dang 'dres pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no ;
translated: Iron is wind, and tin and lead are the nature of the elements mixed with space.

original: / rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te //
analyzed: / rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te //
translated: Yellow jewels are earth, white jewels are water, and red jewels are fire.

original: nag po rlung ngo sngon po dang ni ljang gu de yang de bzhin 'dres pa'i khams las byung ba'o /
analyzed: nag po rlung ngo sngon po dang ni ljang gu de yang de bzhin 'dres pa'i khams las byung ba'o /
translated: Black is wind, and blue and green are also the elements mixed.

original: 185 / lan tshva sa dang mngar ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur zhing tsha ba me dang kha ba rlung yin te //
analyzed: 185 / lan tshva sa dang mngar ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur zhing tsha ba me dang kha ba rlung yin te //
translated: Salt is earth, sweetness is water, heat is fire, and bitterness is wind.

original: skyur dang @99b bska ba'i ro ni 'dres pa dag go slar yang zhing gi  rngo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang // sman rnams rnam pa drug gi ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams //
analyzed: skyur dang @99b bska ba'i ro ni 'dres pa dag go slar yang zhing gi  rngo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang // sman rnams rnam pa drug gi ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams //
translated: The tastes of sour and astringent are mixed. The tastes of the herbs are of six kinds, and the taste of the best is in the gem.

original: sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go /üîΩ186 / sa yis zug gzer 'phrog par byed cing dug kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed de me yis ni //
analyzed: sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go / 186 / sa yis zug gzer 'phrog par byed cing dug kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed de me yis ni //
translated: The earth is the various touches, and the water is the complete taking away of disease.üîΩThe earth takes away pain, and the water element takes away poison.

original: 'byung po rlung gis rengs pa nam mkha' yis kyang gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu lhung ba 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: 'byung po rlung gis rengs pa nam mkha' yis kyang gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu lhung ba 'phrog par byed //
translated: The fire element takes away the paralysis caused by the wind element, and the space element takes away the falling of the evil view.

original: ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kyang //
analyzed: ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kyang //
translated: Wisdom takes away everything, and likewise the gem that resides in the body of the king.

original: chu dang ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags dang sman rnams dag gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab /
analyzed: chu dang ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags dang sman rnams dag gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab /
translated: The power of water, taste, gem, touch, mantra, and medicine is inconceivable.

original: 187 / bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: 187 / bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing //
translated: The Blessed One, whose nature is the wheel of gnosis, enters the field of the buddhas in all directions.

original: slar yang thams cad tshogs pa'i sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: slar yang thams cad tshogs pa'i sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: And again, by the power of the result of the combination of all, sentient beings enter.

original: rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir //
analyzed: rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir //
translated: By the power of their daily progress, the twelve branches, the moon, the full Meru,

original: mchod rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro /
analyzed: mchod rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro /
translated: are the st≈´pa, the vajra-nature, the upper structure, the mandala of the heart of that king.

original: 188 / phyi rol du ni rgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyi sa la sa gzhi la gnas mi rnams so //
analyzed: 188 / phyi rol du ni rgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyi sa la sa gzhi la gnas mi rnams so //
translated: The wheel of the lunar mansions is outside, the people on the earth, on the level of karma.

original: longs spyod sa la gling drug bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lha la sogs pa rnams //
analyzed: longs spyod sa la gling drug bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lha la sogs pa rnams //
translated: On the level of enjoyment, the six continents, the food of the nectar fruit, the gods and so forth.

original: rva la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po me dang dus dang lha min chu gter rlung //
analyzed: rva la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po me dang dus dang lha min chu gter rlung //
translated: The eight directions are the lords of the gods, fire, time, demons, ocean, wind,

original: gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng du 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug nyid dang chu gter gdong /
analyzed: gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng du 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug nyid dang chu gter gdong /
translated: The Yakshas and Rudra are above and below, with their retinues, and Vishnu himself, and the ocean,

original: 189 /'dir ni chu srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung //
analyzed: 189 /'dir ni chu srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung //
translated: are the crocodile, consciousness, and the element of space, and the pot, mental formations, and the wind.

original: nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni //
analyzed: nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni //
translated: The fish, the ram, the bull, and the bow are feeling, which is fire, and perception is water,

original: gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur med dag dang lhan cig skyes pa ka rka ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams so //
analyzed: gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur med dag dang lhan cig skyes pa ka rka ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams so //
translated: and form and earth and the immutable are the houses of Cancer and so forth.

original: 'dir rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa ta pa ta sa ring po thung ngu lhag pa'i lha /
analyzed: 'dir rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa ta pa ta sa ring po thung ngu lhag pa'i lha /
translated: Here, the signs are the long and short vowels, the long and short consonants, and the supernumerary deities.

original: 190 / lug dang 'khrig pa @100a * //
analyzed: 190 / lug dang 'khrig pa @100a * //
translated: The ram and the bow are

original: ka rka tar ni zla ba dkar po nyi ma seng ge bu mo srang rnams so //
analyzed: ka rka tar ni zla ba dkar po nyi ma seng ge bu mo srang rnams so //
translated: Cancer and Leo, respectively, and the moon, the sun, the lion, and the maiden are Virgo.

original: sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar ro //
analyzed: sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar ro //
translated: The earth, the mantra, Rahu, and Mercury are the first and last of the houses of Gemini, Saturn, Jupiter, and Scorpio.

original: de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni kun nas phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye //
analyzed: de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni kun nas phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye //
translated: Thus, O King, the elements such as earth are mutually combined.

original: 'gro ba 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang /
translated: This world is the nature of the karma of sentient beings, filled with all jewels,

original: 191 / gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan //
analyzed: 191 / gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan //
translated: Where on the ground there are wish-fulfilling trees, supreme tastes, medicines, and other tastes,

original: mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste //
analyzed: mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste //
translated: Which are produced by the finest particles, but are not seen by sentient beings.

original: gang zhig phal pa'i rtsa dang shing dang chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnams mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang zhig phal pa'i rtsa dang shing dang chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnams mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: They see ordinary grass, trees, water, dust, stones, and iron.

original: yi dags rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams dag gis kun nas gcod 'bigs so /
analyzed: yi dags rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams dag gis kun nas gcod 'bigs so /
translated: The hungry ghosts see water as a great fire, and the beings in hell see it as a weapon.

original: 192 / 'di rnams sgrol ba'i slad du sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te //
analyzed: 192 / 'di rnams sgrol ba'i slad du sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te //
translated: In order to liberate them, the Victorious One, together with his sons, enters the stage of karma.

original: mngal ni rab tu bzung ba mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni //
analyzed: mngal ni rab tu bzung ba mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni //
translated: Having taken up the womb, having generated enlightenment through supreme compassion,

original: nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te //
analyzed: nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te //
translated: having conquered the afflictions and the demons, he turned the wheel of the Dharma in the place of the earth.

original: sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o //
translated: Having performed the magical emanation, the Blessed One is again just that one, the pure body.

original: 193 / de phyir rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sku ni skyes shing  ma nyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste //
analyzed: 193 / de phyir rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sku ni skyes shing  ma nyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste //
translated: Therefore, the body of the Lord of the Victorious Ones is born and undiminished, and abides in the three existences.

original: bcom ldan de yis thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis bcings pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan de yis thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis bcings pa ma yin no //
translated: The Blessed One never abandons the welfare of sentient beings at any time, nor is he bound by karma.

original: de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su las kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye //
analyzed: de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su las kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye //
translated: Thus, O Sun, the Lord of the World abides in the place of karma in the three existences,

original: sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'phrog lha gzhan dag ni nam yang ma yin no /
analyzed: sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'phrog lha gzhan dag ni nam yang ma yin no /
translated: giving the path to sentient beings, taking away the fear of hell, but never to other gods.

original: 194 / gang dag chos la mngon 'joms rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rjes su chags //
analyzed: 194 / gang dag chos la mngon 'joms rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rjes su chags //
translated: those who die for the sake of their sons in the fire, and those who die for the sake of their relatives through merit‚ÄîüîΩthey go to heaven.üîΩThose who fall into the water while trying to save their bodies, those who die in a sacrifice, those who are killed in battle,

original: shi bar gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen gyi bsod nams dag las mtho ris te //
analyzed: shi bar gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen gyi bsod nams dag las mtho ris te //
translated: those who die for the sake of their sons in the fire, and those who die for the sake of their relatives through merit‚ÄîüîΩthey go to heaven.

original: mchod sbyin la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g-yul du shi bar gyur na mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu @100b 'jug //
