original: khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud //
analyzed: khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud //
translated: You are peaceful, yet you are the good vajra, the snatcher of the fear of death, you are always the demon of the demons.

original: khyod ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug 256 / tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btud par gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar lhung //
analyzed: khyod ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug 256 / tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btud par gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar lhung //
translated: I, the Sun, born of the Brahma caste, bow at the feet of the Sage, born of the Shakya caste.

original: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar byas //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar byas //
translated: For the sake of the liberation of beings, you have fully illuminated the Wheel of Time on earth.

original: rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyi ma sa bdag gis btud dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan ka l'a par //
analyzed: rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyi ma sa bdag gis btud dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan ka l'a par //
translated: O you of the Kalki caste, the Sun, bowed to by the lords of the earth, you are glorious, glorious Kalpa.

original: khyod kyi zhabs kyi padma dag la 'jigs rung 'khor bas 'jigs pa dag ni skyabs su lhag par mchi /
analyzed: khyod kyi zhabs kyi padma dag la 'jigs rung 'khor bas 'jigs pa dag ni skyabs su lhag par mchi /
translated: Those who are terrified by the fearsome cycle of existence take refuge in your lotus feet.

original: 257 / sa ga'i zla ba'i nya la mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la //
analyzed: 257 / sa ga'i zla ba'i nya la mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la //
translated: On the full moon of Sagacity, when the night has passed and the day has not yet dawned,

original: thub pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna tshogs gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob //
analyzed: thub pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna tshogs gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob //
translated: the Sage, along with his people, the Sun, the chief of the various, has attained the siddhi of mudra through the blessing of the Lord.

original: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du bdag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dag sa la gnas pa bzhin //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du bdag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dag sa la gnas pa bzhin //
translated: For the sake of the liberation of sentient beings, may my mind-vajra remain on the earth.

original: dus kyi 'khor lo'i mthu las sems can nyid rnams dag gi rnam gsum srid pa dag la gnas gyur cig 258 /
analyzed: dus kyi 'khor lo'i mthu las sems can nyid rnams dag gi rnam gsum srid pa dag la gnas gyur cig 258 /
translated: By the power of the KƒÅlacakra, may all sentient beings abide in the three existences.

original: @107a * // sems can kun don mdzad pa po yis mchog gi thugs rje dag gis rgyud kyi don ni bstan mdzad nas //
analyzed: @107a * // sems can kun don mdzad pa po yis mchog gi thugs rje dag gis rgyud kyi don ni bstan mdzad nas //
translated: Having taught the meaning of the tantra with supreme compassion, for the sake of all sentient beings,

original: sras po padma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gter la gnang ba stsal ba nges par ni //
analyzed: sras po padma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gter la gnang ba stsal ba nges par ni //
translated: you have given the excellent treasure of qualities to your son, the supreme Padma White.üîΩFirst, you should place the entire king of tantras, without error, in books,

original: dang por khyod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag mtshang med pa glegs bam dag la gnas pa dang ; / de nas rang gi 'dod pas 'grel bshad byas nas gzhan gyi gnas su bgrod par bya'o 'jig rten gnyen /
analyzed: dang por khyod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag mtshang med pa glegs bam dag la gnas pa dang ; / de nas rang gi 'dod pas 'grel bshad byas nas gzhan gyi gnas su bgrod par bya'o 'jig rten gnyen /
translated: and then, having composed a commentary according to your wishes, you should go to other places, O friend of the world.

original: 259 / gang dag steng na bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu 'jigs byed byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
analyzed: 259 / gang dag steng na bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu 'jigs byed byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
translated: The bodhisattvas, who are the supreme terror of the demigods who dwell above in the realm of MƒÅra,
